preamble.p: Sibothulel’ umnqwazi abo baye bev’ ubunzima ukuze kubekho ubulungisa nenkululeko elizweni lethu;
Siyabahlonela abo baye basebenzela ukwakha nokuphucula ilizwe lethu; kwaye
Sikholelwa kwelokuba uMzantsi-Afrika ngowabo bonke abahlala kuwo, bemanyene nangona bengafani.
Ngoko ke, ngabameli bethu abanyulwe ngokukhululekileyo, samkela lo Mgaqo-siseko njengomthetho owongamileyo weRiphablikhi ukuze—

li.p: Kungcibeke imisantsa yexesha elidlulileyo, kwakheke noluntu lwentando yesininzi, ubulungisa basentlalweni namalungelo oluntu asisiseko;
Kwandlalwe iziseko zoluntu lwentando yesininzi nolukhululekileyo apho urhulumente engowentando yabantu kwaye ummi ngamnye ekhuselwe ngumthetho ngokulinganayo nabanye;
Kuphuculwe umgangatho wobomi wabo bonke abemi, kukhululwe nomntu ngamnye afikelele kwelona nqanaba anokufikelela kulo lobuchule bakhe; kananjalo
Kwakhiwe uMzantsi-Afrika omanyeneyo wentando yesininzi okwaziyo ukuthabatha indawo yawo onelungelo layo njengelizwe elizimeleyo kusapho phakathi kwamanye amazwe.

preamble.p: Ngamana uThixo angabakhusela abantu bakowethu. Nkosi sikelel’ iAfrika. Morena boloka setjhaba sa heso. God seën Suid-Afrika. God bless South Africa. Mudzimu fhatutshedza Afurika. Hosi katekisa Afrika.

content.p: IRiphablikhi yoMzantsi-Afrika ililizwe elinye, elizimeleyo, lentando yesininzi elisekelwe koku kulandelayo:

item.p: sokuba ngumntu, ukufikelela ekulinganeni kwabantu bonke nokukhuthazwa kwamalungelo oluntu neenkululeko omalube nazo;
ukungacaluli ngokobuhlanga nangokobuni;
ukongama koMgaqo-siseko nokulawula komthetho;

ilungelo lokuvota kwabo bonke abantu abadala, umqulu wabavoti omnye wezwelonke, unyulo olubakho rhoqo nenkqubo yamaqela amaninzi opolitiko yorhulumente wesininzi, ukuqinisekisa uxanduva lokuphendula, ukusabela nokusebenzela elubala.

content.p: Lo Mgaqo-siseko ungumthetho owongamileyo weRiphablikhi; umthetho okanye ukwenza okungavisisaniyo nawo kuphuthile kwaye iimbopheleleko ezifunwa nguwo mazifezekiswe.
Wonke umntu waseMzantsi-Afrika ungummi.
Bonke abemi–

item.p: banamalungelo ngokulinganayo okuxhamla kumalungelo, kwiinyhweba neenzuzo zokuba ngummi; kwaye
banoxanduva ngokulinganayo lokufeza iimbopheleleko noxanduva lokuba ngummi.

content.p: Imithetho yepalamente yezwelonke mayithethe ngokuzuzwa kobumi, ngokulahlekelwa bubo nangokubuyiselwa kwabo.
NguMongameli owenza isigqibo ngomhobe wesizwe weRiphablikhi ngokwenza isihlokomiso.
Iflegi yelizwe yeRiphablikhi ingumbala omnyama, nagolide, naluhlaza, namhlophe, nabomvu, naluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka, njengoko ichazwe kwaye yazotywa kwiSihlomelo 1.
Iilwimi zaseburhulumenteni zeRiphablikhi siSepedi, neSesotho, neSetswana, neSiswati, nesiVenda, nesiTsonga, nesiBhulu, nesiNgesi, nesiNdebele, nesiXhosa, nesiZulu.

Ngokuqonda imeko yeelwimi zomthonyama zabantu bakowethu nembali yazo yokuncitshiswa kokusetyenziswa kwazo, urhulumente makathabathe amanyathelo asebenzisekayo naqinisekileyo okuphakamisa umgangatho wezi lwimi aze akhuthaze ukusetyenziswa kwazo.

item.p: Urhulumente wezwelonke noorhulumente bamaphondo banokusebenzisa naziphi na iilwimi zaseburhulumenteni, bezisebenzisela imisebenzi yoburhulumente, becingela ukusetyenziswa kwazo, ukusebenziseka kwazo, indleko yokuzisebenzisa, iimeko zengingqi neemfuno zoluntu noko kukhethwa luluntu lulonke okanye kwiphondo elo; kodwa yena urhulumente wezwelonke kunye norhulumente ngamnye wephondo makasebenzise ubuncinane iilwimi ezimbini zaseburhulumenteni.
Oomasipala mabacingele ukusetyenziswa kweelwimi ngabahlali kunye noko kukhethwa ngabo.

content.p: Urhulumente wezwelonke noorhulumente bamaphondo mabathi, ngokuwis’ imithetho nangezinye iindlela, bakulawule kwaye bakubek’esweni ukusetyenziswa kweelwimi zabo zaseburhulumenteni. Kungekuko ukuba kuyaphambukwa koko kutshiwo kwisiqendwana (2), zonke iilwimi zaseburhulumenteni mazixatyiswe ngokulinganayo kwaye maziphathwe ngokungakhwinisiyo.
IBhodi Yeelwimi YaseMzantsi-Afrika esekwe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke–

item.p: mayikhuthaze, kwaye idale iimeko, zokuphuhliswa nokusetyenziswa–
kwazo zonke iilwimi zaseburhulumenteni;
kulwimi lwamaKhoi, nolwamaNama nolwamaSan; kunye
nolwimi lwezandla; kananjalo
ikhuthaze ize iqinisekise ukuhlonelwa–
kwazo zonke iilwimi ezisetyenziswa ngokuqhelekileyo ngabantu ngabantu eMzantsi-Afrika, kuquka nesiJamani, nesiGrike, nesiGujarati, nesiHindi, nesiPhuthukezi, nesiTamil, nesiTelegu nesiUrdu; kunye
nesiArabhu, nesiHebhere, nesiSanskrit kunye nezinye iilwimi ezisetyenziselwa ukunqula eMzantsi-Afrika.

content.p: Lo Mqulu wamaLungelo ulilitye lembombo lentando yesininzi eMzantsi-Afrika. Uqulethe amalungelo abo bonke abantu elizweni lethu kwaye uqinisekisa sokuba ngumntu, ukulingana nenkululeko yentando yesininzi.
Urhulumente makawahlonele, awakhusele, awakhuthaze kwaye awafezekise amalungelo akuMqulu wamaLungelo.
Amalungelo akuMqulu wamaLungelo anokuthi asikelwe umda lusikelo-mda olukwisiqendu 36, okanye olukwenye indawo kuMqulu.
UMqulu wamaLungelo usebenza kuwo wonke umthetho, kwaye unkqamangela abawisi-mthetho, urhulumente, iinkundla nawo onke amacandelo karhulumente.

Okutshiwo kuMqulu wamaLungelo kunkqamangela umntu okanye inkampani, ukuba kuyasebenza kuyo, kuxhomekeke nasekubeni kusebenza kangakanani, kucingelwa ubunjani belungelo nobunjani boxanduva oluza nelungelo elo.
Xa isebenzisa okutshiwo nguMqulu wamaLungelo kumntu okanye kwinkampani ngokwesiqendwana (2), inkundla–

item.p: ukuze iphumeze ilungelo elikuMqulu, mayisebenzise, okanye ukuba kuyimfuneko, iphuhlise umthetho wohlobo olungabhalwanga phantsi, xaumthetho wepalamente wona ungalifezekisi elo lungelo; kwaye
isenokuphuhlisa imigaqo yomthetho wohlobo olungabhalwanga phantsi ukulisikel’umda ilungelo, kodwa kuxhomekeke ekubeni oko kusikelwa umda kuyavumelana kusinina nesiqendu 36(1).

content.p: Inkampani inelungelo lokuxhamla kumalungelo akuMqulu wamaLungelo kangangoko kufunwa bubunjani bamalungelo nabubunjani baloo nkampani.
Bonke abantu bayalingana phambi komthetho kwaye banelungelo lokukhuselwa ngokulinganayo ngumthetho nokuzuza ngokulinganayo kuwo.

Ukulingana kuquka ukuxhanyulwa okupheleleyo nokulinganayo kwawo onke amalungelo neenkululeko. Ngenjongo yokukhuthaza ukuba kulinganwe, kusenokuthatyathwa amanyathelo okuwis’umthetho namanye amanyathelo acetyelwe ukukhusela okanye ukuphucula abantu, okanye iindidi zabantu, ezihlelelekileyo ngenxa yokucalulwa okungafanelekanga.

Urhulumente akavumelekanga ukuba athi, ngokungqalileyo okanye ngokungangqalanga, acalule nabani na ngenye yezi ndlela zilandelayo: ngokobuhlanga, ngokobuni, ngokukhulelwa, ngobume bomntu ngokwasemtshatweni, ngobuzwe okanye ngemvelaphi yakhe ngokwasentlalweni, ngebala, ngotyekelo lwakhe ngokwesondo, ngobudala beminyaka, ngokugogeka, ngonqulo, ngesazela, ngenkolelo, ngenkcubeko, ngolwimi nangokuzalwa.

Akukho mntu uvumelekileyo ukuba acalule ngokungafanelekanga, ngokungqalileyo okanye ngokungangqalanga, ecalula omnye ngenye yezi ndlela zixelwe kwisiqendwana (3). Makuwiswe umthetho yipalamente yezwelonke ukuthintela ucalulo olungafanelekanga.
Ukucalula ngenye yezi ndlela zidweliswe kwisiqendwana (3) okanye ngeendlela eziliqela kwezo kukucalula okungafanelekanga ngaphandle kokuba kuveliswa izibakala ezibonisa ukuba olo calulo lufanelekile.
Wonk’ubani unesidima esingenakohluthwa nelungelo lokuba sihlonitshwe sakhe kwaye sikhuselwe.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuphila.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lenkululeko nokukhuseleka, elibandakanya ilungelo–

item.p: lokuba angayohluthwa inkululeko ngokuzenzela nje, okanye kungekho sizathu sivakalayo;
lokuba angavalelwa uhalala kungathethwa tyala;
lokuba angagonyamelwa nangaluphi na uhlobo, nokuba kukugonyamelwa ngamagosa aseburhulumenteni okanye ngabantu nje;
lokuba angangcungcuthekiswa nangayiphi na indlela; nelokuba
angaphathwa okanye ohlwaywe ngendlela ekhohlakeleyo, engenabuntu okanye ethob’.

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuba angenziwa nto emzimbeni nasengqondweni, eliquka ilungelo–

item.p: lokuzenzel’isigqibo mayela nokuzala;
lokukhuseleka komzimba wakhe nokuba ulawulwe nguye; nelokuba
kungenziwa ufuniselo lonyango okanye lobunzululwazi kuye ngaphandle kwemvume yakhe.

content.p: Akukho bani unokwenziwa ikhoboka okanye enziswe umsebenzi wesinyanzelo.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuba neemfihlo, eliquka ilungelo lokuba–

item.p: angasetshwa emzimbeni okanye kungasetshwa umzi wakhe;
ingasetshwa impahla yakhe;
zingathathwa izinto zakhe; okanye
zingaphulaphulwa iincoko zakhe nabanye abantu.

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokwenza ngokwesazela sakhe, unenkululeko yokunqula, yokucinga, yokukholelwa, nokuba noluvo lwakhe.
Unqulo lunokuqhutywa kumaziko karhulumente okanye kumaziko ancediswa ngurhulumente, kodwa kuxhomekeka ekubeni–

item.p: oko kunqula kulandela imigaqo eyenziwe ngabasemagunyeni abafanelekileyo;
kunqulwa ngendlela engakhalazisiyo; kwaye
ukubakho apho kusimahla kwaye kungokuzithandela.
Esi siqendu asiyithinteli imithetho yepalamente–
eyamkelayo imitshato ekungenwe kuyo ngokwesithethe, okanye ngokwenkqubo yonqulo, okanye ngokwenkqubo yosapho; okanye
eyamkela iinkqubo ekuqhutywa ngazo kusapho oluthile ngokwesithethe, okanye ngokwabantu bonqulo oluthile.
Ukwamkelwa yimithetho yepalamente ngokwesiqendu (a) makuvisisane nokutshiwo kwesi siqendu nokunye okutshiwo nguMgaqo-siseko.

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lenkululeko yokuthetha, eliquka–

item.p: inkululeko yamaphephandaba namanye amajelo eendaba;
inkululeko yokufumana ingcombolo okanye ukunika abanye ingcombolo okanye iingcamango;
inkululeko yokusebenzisa ubuchule bokuziqalela izinto;
nenkululeko yemfundo nenkululeko yophando kubunzululwazi.

content.p: Ilungelo elikwisiqendwana (1) aliquki–

item.p: ukuphemb’imfazwe;
ukuthundeza abanye ukwenz’ugonyamelo olukhawulezileyo; okanye
ukukhuthaza intiyo esekelwe kubuhlanga, ubuzwe, ubuni okanye unqulo, nekhuthaza ukwenzakalisa.

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuhlanganisana nabanye, lokuqhankqalaza nelokudlulisa uxwebhu lwezikhalazo, ekwenza oko ngoxolo kwaye engaxhobanga.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuzibandakanya ngokukhululekileyo.
Wonke ummi ukhululekile ukwenza ukhetho kupolitiko, okuquka ilungelo–

item.p: lokusungula umbutho wopolitiko;
lokuthabath’inxaxheba kwimisebenzi yombutho wopolitiko, okanye ukuwugayel’amalungu umbutho wopolitiko;
nokuphum’iphulo lombutho wopolitiko okanye iphulo lenjongo yopolitiko.

content.p: Wonke ummi unelungelo lonyulo olukhululekileyo, olungenamkhethe nolubakho rhoqo lalo naliphi na iqumrhu lowiso-mthetho elisekwe ngokoMgaqo-siseko.
Wonk’ummi ongumntu omdala unelungelo–

item.p: lokuvota kunyulo evotela naliphi na iqumrhu lowiso-mthetho elisekwe ngokoMgaqo-siseko, ekwenza oko emfihlakalweni;
nelokuzigqatsela isikhundla saseburhulumenteni aze, ukuba unyuliwe, angene aso.

content.p: Akukho mmi onokohluthwa ubumi.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lenkululeko yokuhamba-hamba.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokumka kwiRiphablikhi.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokungena kwiRiphablikhi, lokuqhubeka engaphakathi kuyo, nelokuhlala naphi na kuyo.
Wonk’ummi unelungelo lokuba nephaspothi.

section.heading: Inkululeko yokurhweba, yokusebenza nokwenza umsebenzi ofundelweyo

content.p: Wonk’ummi unelungelo lokukhetha ngokukhululeka urhwebo alufunayo, umsebenzi okanye umsebenzi awufundeleyo. Ukurhweba, ukusebenza okanye ukwenza umsebenzi ofundelweyo kusenokuthi kulawulwe ngumthetho.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuphathwa ngendlela engenamkhethe emsebenzini.
Wonk’umsébenzi unelungelo–

item.p: lokusungula umbutho wabasebenzi nokuzimanya nawo;
lokuthabath’inxaxheba kwimisebenzi yombutho wabasebenzi nakwizicwangciso zayo;
nelokugwayimba.

content.p: Wonk’umqeshi unelungelo–

item.p: lokusungula umbutho wabaqeshi nokuzimanya nawo;
nelokuthabath’inxaxheba kwimisebenzi yombutho wabaqeshi nakwizicwangciso zawo.

content.p: Umbutho ngamnye wabasebenzi nombutho ngamnye wabaqeshi unelungelo–

item.p: lokwenz’izigqibo ngolawulo lwawo nezicwangciso zawo nemisebenzi yawo;
lokuququzelela;
nelokusungula umanyano uze uzibandakanye nalo.

content.p: Umbutho ngamnye wabasebenzi, umbutho ngamnye wabaqeshi nomqeshi banelungelo lokubandakanyeka kwiingxoxo zokubonisana. Kunokuwisw’umthetho wezwelonke ngenjongo yokulawula iingxoxo zokubonisana. Xa kunokuthi umthetho wepalamente ulisikel’umda ilungelo elikwesi Sahluko, oko kulisikel’ umda makuvisisane nesiqendu 36(1).

Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke usenokuthi uwamkele amalungiselelo okhuseleko ombutho wabasebenzi aqulethwe kwizivumelwano zendibaniselwano. Xa unokuthi umthetho owiswe yipalamente ulisikel’umda ilungelo elikwesi Sahluko, oko kulisikel’umda makuvusisane nesiqendu 36(1).
Wonk’ubani unelungelo–

item.p: lokuba okusingqongileyo kungabi yingozi kwimpilo yakhe okanye kwintlalo- ntle yakhe;
nelokuba okusingqongileyo kukhuselwe, ukuze kuncedakale izizukulwana zangoku nezexesha elizayo, ngokuthi kuwisw’imithetho enokubonelela, kusetyenziswa nezinye iindlela–
ezithintela ungcoliso nokuwohloka kwemeko yokusingqongileyo;
ezikhuthaza ulondolozo lwendalo;
nolwenza uphuhliso oluqhubekayo lwemeko yokusingqongileyo nokusetyenziswa kobuncwane bendalo ngoxa zikhuthaza uphuhliso oluthethelelekayo kuqoqosho nakwintlalo.

content.p: Akukho bani onokohluthwa umhlaba okanye isakhiwo ngaphandle kokuba kungomthetho osebenza kuwonkewonke, kwaye akukho mthetho onokuvumela ukohluthwa komhlaba okanye isakhiwo kungaboniswananga.
Umhlaba okanye isakhiwo unokuthathwa kuphela ngokomthetho osebenza kuwonkewonke–

item.p: ngenjongo eyekarhulumente okanye ukuze kuncedakale uluntu;

xa kuthe kwakho imbuyekezo, exabiso layo, nexesha emayihlawulwe ngalo, nendlela emayihlawulwe ngayo, ekufanele ukuba kuvunyelwane ngabo bachaphazelekayo, kungenjalo igqitywe yinkundla okanye ivunywe yiyo.

content.p: Isixa sembuyekezo nexesha lokuhlawulwa kwayo nendlela yokuhlawulwa kwayo mazibe zezinobulungisa nezingakhalazisiyo, zibonakalisa ukulinga-lingana okungakhalazisiyo phakathi koncedo oluzuzwa luluntu nokuchaphazeleka kwabo bachaphazelekayo, kucingelwa zonke iimeko ezifanelwe kukucingelwa, eziquka–

item.p: into osetyenziselwa yona ngoku umhlaba lowo okanye isakhiwo;
mbali yokuzuzwa kwaloo mhlaba okanye isakhiwo neyokusetyenziswa kwawo okanye kwaso;
ixabiso laloo mhlaba okanye isakhiwo emarikeni;
ukuthi urhulumente wenza utyalo-mali kangakanani kuwo okanye kuso ngokuthe ngqo noncedo-mali ekuzuzweni kwaloo mhlaba okanye isakhiwo nokuphuculwa kwawo okanye kwaso okuluncedo;
nenjongo yokuthathwa kwawo okanye kwaso.

content.p: Ngenjongo yokusebenza kwesi siqendu-

item.p: ukuncedakala koluntu kuquka ukuzibophelela kwesizwe ekuguqulweni kwenkqubo yomhlaba, nakwiinguqu zokubangela ukuba kufikeleleke ngokungakhalazisiyo kubo bonke ubuncwane bendalo boMzantsi-Afrika;
ipropati ayiqingqekanga kumhlaba.

content.p: Urhulumente makathabathe amanyathelo afanelekileyo ngokuwis’imithetho nangezinye iindlela, ngokobuncwane anabo, ukubangela iimeko ezenza ukuba abemi bakwazi ukuba nomhlaba ngokungakhalazisiyo.

Umntu okanye abantu abalungelo labo lomhlaba okanye isakhiwo lingakhuselekanga ngokwasemthethweni ngenxa yemithetho okanye imikhwa yexesha elidlulileyo ecalula ngokobuhlanga unelungelo okanye banelungelo, kangangoko kuvunyelwa nguMthetho wePalamente, lokubambelela kwilungelo elikhuselekileyo ngokwasemthethweni okanye unelungelo okanye banelungelo lokuba abuyiselwe okanye babuyiselwe okulingana noko alahlekelwe okanye balahlekelwe kuko.

Umntu okanye abantu abohluthwe umhlaba okanye isakhiwo emva komhla we-19 kuJuni 1913 ngenxa yemithetho okanye imikhwa yexesha elidlulileyo ecalula ngokobuhlanga unelungelo okanye banelungelo kangangoko kuvunyelwa nguMthetho wePalamente ukuba abuyiselwe okanye babuyiselwe loo mhlaba okanye eso sakhiwo okanye afumane okanye bafumane imbuyekezo elingana noko alahlekelwe kuko okanye balahlekelwe kuko.

Akukho okutshiwo sesi siqendu okunokuthintela urhulumente ekuthabatheni amanyathelo okuwis’umthetho nawolunye uhlobo ukuze kubekho inguqu kwinkqubo yomhlaba namanzi nokunye okuhlobene noko, ngenjongo yokulungisa iziphumo zocalulo lobuhlanga lwexesha elidlulileyo, kodwa ke kuxhomekeke ekubeni nakuphi na okutenxileyo okutshiwo sesi siqendu kuyavisisana nokutshiwo sisiqendu 36(1).
IPalamente mayiwise umthetho ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (6).
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuba nendlu eyaneleyo.
Urhulumente makathabathe amanyathelo afanelekileyo ngokuwis’imithetho nangezinye iindlela, ngokobuncwane anabo, ukuze alenze lifezeke ngokuthe ngcembe eli lungelo.

Akukho mntu onokukhutshwa ekhayeni lakhe, okanye adilizelwe ikhaya lakhe, ngaphandle komyalelo wenkundla okhutshwe emva kokuqwalasela zonke iimeko emaziqwalaselwe. Akukho mthetho wepalamente onokuvumela ukukhutshwa ezindlwini kungaboniswananga.

section.heading: Unonophelo lwempilo, ukutya, amanzi nokhuseleko eluntwini

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokufumana–

item.p: iinkonzo zokunonophelwa kwempilo, kuquka nononophelo lwempilo olumayela nokuzala;
ukutya okwaneleyo namanzi; kwakunye
nokhuseleko eluntwini, kuquka, ukuba akanandlela yokuzondla ngokwakhe nabo baxhomekeke kuye, noncedo olufanelekileyo oluvela eluntwini.

content.p: Urhulumente makathabathe amanyathelo afanelekileyo okuwis’imithetho nawezinye iindlela, ngokobuncwane obufumanekayo, ukuze la malungelo afezeke ngokuthe ngcembe.
Akukho bani onokwalelwa unyango kwimeko yequbuliso.
Wonke umntwana unelungelo–

item.p: lokuba negama nelizwe angummi walo ukususela ekuzalweni;
lokunonophelwa lusapho okanye lokunonophelwa ngabazali, okanye lokunonophelwa ngenye indlela efanelekileyo xa esusiwe elusatsheni lwakowabo;
lokufumana ukutya okunesondlo esisisiseko, ikhusi, iinkonzo zokunonophelwa kwempilo ezisisiseko neenkonzo zoonontlalo-ntle;
lokukhuselwa kwimpatho-mbi, kwintswela-nkathalo, ekuxhatshazweni okanye ekuthotyweni ;
lokukhuselwa ekuxhatshazweni kwiimeko zasempangelweni;
lokungayalelwa okanye lokungavunyelwa ukuba enze umsebenzi okanye enze iinkonzo–
ezingamfanelanga umntu ongumntwana; okanye
ezibeka emngciphekweni impilo-ntle yomntwana, imfundo yakhe, impilo yakhe engokwasemzimbeni okanye engokwasengqondweni okanye engokomoya, nokukhula kwakhe;

lokuba angavalelwa, ngaphandle kokuba alikho elinye icebo elinokuzanywa, ekuya kuthi xa kunjalo ke, ukongezelela kumalungelo anawo umntwana ngokwesiqendu 12 nesama-35, umntwana abe nokuvalelwa elona xesha lifutshane lifanelekileyo, kwaye unelungelo–
lokungadityaniswa nabanye abantu abavalelweyo ababudala bungaphezu kweminyaka eli-18;
nelokuphathwa ngendlela ebonisa, kwaye egcinwe kwiimeko ezibonisa, ulwazelelelo ngobudala bomntwana;
lokuba abe negqwetha alinikwa ngurhulumente, ngeendleko zikarhulumente, kumatyala embambano achaphazela umntwana, ukuba ukungabikho kwegqwetha bekuya kubangela intswela-bulungisa enkulu;
nelokungasetyenziswa ngokuthe ngqo kungquzulwano ekuxhotyiweyo kulo, nelokukhuselwa ngamaxesha ongquzulwano ekuxhotyiweyo kulo.

content.p: Ukulungelwa komntwana kokona kubalulekileyo kuwo nawuphi na umcimbi ongomntwana.
Kwesi siqendu igama elithi “umntwana”lithetha umntu obudala bungaphantsi kweminya eli-18.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo–

item.p: lokufumana imfundo esisiseko, kuquka nemfundo yabantu abadala esisiseko;
nelokufumana imfundo ebhekele phaya, mfundo leyo urhulumente amele ukuba ayenze ifumaneke ngokuthe ngcembe ngokuthabath’amanyathelo afanelekileyo.

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokufumana imfundo ngolwimi lwaseburhulumenteni okanye ngeelwimi ezikhethwe nguye kumaziko emfundo karhulumente apho loo mfundo inokuthi ifumaneke khona. Ukuze urhulumente aqinisekise ukufezekiswa kweli lungelo nokwenziwa kwalo lisebenze, makacinge ngazo zonke iindllela ezifanelekileyo ezizezinye zemfundo, kuquka namaziko afundisa ngolwimi olunye, kucingelwa–

item.p: ubulungisa;
ukusebenziseka;
nemfuneko yokulungisa iziphumo zemithetho nemikhwa yocalulo lobuhlanga yexesha elidlulileyo.

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokwakha amaziko emfundo azimeleyo aze awalondoloze ngeendleko zakhe, kube ngamaziko–

item.p: angacaluliyo ngobuhlanga;
abhalisiweyo kurhulumente;
angehleliyo ngezantsi kumgangatho wamaziko emfundo karhulumente.

content.p: Isiqendwana (3) asikuthinteli ukufunyanwa kwenkxaso-mali karhulumente ngamaziko emfundo azimeleyo.

Wonk’umntu unelungelo lokusebenzisa ulwimi oluthandwa nguye nokuthabath’ inxaxheba kubomi benkcubeko obuthandwa nguye, kodwa akukho bani osebenzisa la malungelo uvumelekileyo ukuwasebenzisa ngendlela engavisisaniyo noko kutshiwo kuMqulu wamaLungelo.

section.heading: Abantu abaphila ngokwenkcubeko yabo, ngokonqulo lwabo nangokolwimi lwabo

content.p: Abantu abangabenkcubeko ethile, abangabonqulo oluthile, okanye abangabolwimi oluthile abanakulibandezwa ilungelo, bekunye nabanye abantu boluntu lwakowabo–

item.p: lokuyonwabela inkcubeko yabo, lokunqula ngokonqulo lwabo, nelokusebenzisa ulwimi lwabo;
nelokusungula imibutho yenkcubeko, yonqulo, neyolwimi, aze umntu azimanye nayo kwaye ayilondoloze, kunye neminye imibutho yoluntu.

content.p: Amalungelo akwisiqendwana (1) akanakusetyenziswa ngendlela engavisisaniyo nokutshiwo kuMqulu wamaLungelo.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokufumana–

item.p: nayiphi na ingcombolo ekurhulumente; kunye
nayo nayiphi na ingcombolo ekomnye umntu, efunekayo ukuze umntu akwazi ukusebenzisa okanye ukukhusela amalungelo.

content.p: Makuwiswe umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ngenjongo yokufezekisa eli lungelo, kwaye loo mthetho unokutsho amanyathelo afanelekileyo amakathatyathwe okwenza lula umthwalo omayela nolawulo nezimali othwelwe ngurhulumente.
Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuba ukwenziwa kwesigqibo ngomcimbi wakhe kube kokusemthethweni, okunokubonelela nokusingethwe ngobulungisa.
Wonk’ubani omalungelo akhe aye anyhashwa sisigqibo esithathiweyo unelungelo lokunikwa izizathu ezibhaliweyo.
Makuwiswe umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ngenjongo yokufezekisa la malungelo, kwaye loo mthetho–

item.p: mawuyalele ukuba isigqibo esithatyathiweyo siqwalaselwe ngokutsha yinkundla okanye, apho kufanelekileyo, ngabachopheli-matyalaabazimeleyo, abangenamkhethe;
mawunyanzele urhulumente ukuba afezekise amalungelo akwisiqendwana (1) nesesi-(2); kwaye
mawukhuthaze ukwenziwa kwezigqibo ngokutyibilikayo.

content.p: Wonk’ubani unelungelo lokuba nayiphi na imbambano anayo enokusonjululwa ngokusetyenziswa komthetho kwenziwe isigqibo ngayo ekuxoxweni kwetyala okungenamkhethe esidlangalaleni phambi kwenkundla okanye, apho kufanelekileyo, phambi kwabanye abachopheli-matyala abazimeleyo abangenamkethe.
Wonk’ubani obanjiweyo etyholwa ngokwaphul’umthetho unelungelo-

item.p: lokuthula;
lokwaziswa ngokukhawuleza–
ngelungelo lokuthula;
angeziphumo zokungathuli;
lokunganyanzelwa ukuba enze imvumo-tyala enokuthi isetyenziswe kubungqina nxamnye naye;
lokuziswa phambi kwenkundla kamsinya kangangoko kunokwenzeka, kodwa kungekapheli-
iiyure ezingama-48 ebanjiwe; okanye

imini yokuqala yenkundla emva kokuba kuphele iiyure ezingama-48, ukuba iiyure ezingama-48 ziphela kungezizo iiyure zokusebenza kwenkundla eziqhelekileyo okanye ngemini engeyiyo imini yokusebenza kwenkundla eqhelekileyo;
lokuba ekuveleni kwakhe kokuqala enkundleni emva kokuba ebanjiwe, abekw’ ityala okanye aziswe ngesizathu sokuqhubeka kokuvalelwa, kungenjalo akhululwe;
nelokukhululwa ekuvalelweni ukuba ubulungisa buyavuma, ekhululwa ngemiqathango enokubonelela.

content.p: Wonk’ubani ovalelweyo, kuquka nebanjwa ngalinye eligwetyiweyo, unelungelo–

item.p: lokwaziswa ngokukhawuleza ngesizathu sokuvalelwa;
lokukhetha igqwetha aze afakan’umlomo nalo, kwaye aziswe ngeli lungelo msinya;
lokuba anikwe igqwetha ngurhulumente ngeendleko zikarhulumente, ukuba ngokungabi nalo kungakho intswela-bulungisa enkulu, kwaye aziswe ngeli lungelo msinya;
lokukucel’umngeni ukuba semthethweni kokuvalelwa kwakhe, ekwenza oko buqu phambi kwenkundla, kuze kuthi, ukuba ukuvalelwa oko akukho mthethweni, akhululwe;

lokuba iimeko avalelwe kuzo zivisisane nokuba nesidima kwakhe, ziquke ubuncinane ukwenza umthambo nokunikwa indawo yokuhlala eyaneleyo, ukutya okunesondlo, into efundwayo nonyango, ngeendleko zikarhulumente;
nelokuba athethe kwaye atyelelwe–
liqabane lakhe lomtshato okanye sisinqandamathe;
sisihlobo esisondeleyo;
ngumluleki okhethwe nguye kwicala lonqulo;
nangugqirha okhethwe nguye.

content.p: Wonke umntu omangalelweyo unelungelo lokuxoxwa kwetyala okunobulungisa, okuquka ilungelo–

item.p: lokwaziswa ngesimangalo esineenkcukacha ezaneleyo ukuze akwazi ukusiphendula;
lokuba nexesha elaneleyo namancedo awaneleyo okulungiselela ukuzithethelela;
lokuba ityala lakhe lixoxwe elubala phambi kwenkundla eqhelekileyo;
lokuba ukuxoxwa kwetyala lakhe kuqalise kuze kufike esiphelweni ngaphandle kokulibaziseka okungavakaliyo;
lokuba abekho xa kuxoxwa ityala lakhe;
lokuba azikhethele igqwetha aze amelwe lilo, kwaye aziswe ngeli lungelo msinya;
lokuba anikwe igqwetha ngurhulumente ngeendleko zikarhulumente, ukuba ngokungalinikwa kungakho intswela-bulungisa enkulu, kwaye aziswe ngeli lungelo msinya;
lokuba athathwe njengomntu omsulwa, athule, anganiki bungqina ekuxoxweni kwetyala;
lokuba anike ubungqina kwaye abuphikise ubungqina obunikiweyo;
lokuba anganyanzelwa ukunika ubungqina obumdyobha ngetyala;
lokuba lixoxwe ityala lakhe ngolwimi aluqondayo, kungenjalo ukuba akunakwenzeka oko, atolikelwe ngolo lwimi aluqondayo kwelo tyala;

lokuba angafunyaniswa enetyala lokwenza isenzo okanye lokungenzi isenzo esasingekuko ukwaphul’umthetho ngokomthetho welizwe okanye ngokomthetho wamazwe ngamazwe ngexesha awasenza ngalo okanye ngexesha angazange asenze ngalo;
lokuba angaxoxisw’ityala ngokwaphul’umthetho mayela nokwenza okanye ukungenzi isenzo awayesele efunyaniswe engenatyala okanye awayesele efunyaniswe enetyala ngaso;

lokuba afumane esona sincinane kwizohlwayo ezitshiwo ngumthetho ukuba isohlwayo esifunwa ngumthetho sokwaphul’umthetho siye satshintshwa kwixesha eliphakathi kokwaphula kwakhe umthetho nokugwetywa kwakhe;
nelokubhenela kwinkundla engentla okanye ityala lakhe liqwalaselwe ngokutsha yiyo.

content.p: Nanini na xa esi siqendu sifuna ukuba umntu anikwe ingcombolo, makayinikwe loo ngcombolo ngolwimi aluqondayo.

Ubungqina obufunyenwe ngendlela enyhasha ilungelo elikuMqulu wamaLungelo mabungamkelwa ukuba ukwamkelwa kwabo kuya kukwenza ukuxoxwa kwetyala kube kokungenabulungisa okanye kube nobungozi ekusingathweni kobulungisa.

Amalungelo akuMqulu wamaLungelo anokusikelwa umda kuphela ngokomthetho osebenza kuwonkewonke, kodwa ukusikelwa umda oko kube kokunokubonelela nokuthethelelekayo kuluntu olukhululekileyo lwentando yesininzi oluhlonela sokuba ngumntu, ukulingana nenkululeko, kuvelelwa zonke iinkalo emazivelelwe, eziquka–

item.p: ubunjani belungelo;
ukubaluleka kwenjongo yokusikelwa umda;
ubunjani bokusikelwa umda nobungakanani bako;
ikhonkco phakathi kokusikelwa umda nenjongo yako;
nokusetyenziswa kweyona ndlela ingcathu yokuyifeza loo njongo.

content.p: Ngaphandle kokuba kwenziwa ngendlela exelwe kwisiqendwana (1) okanye exelwe kwezinye iinxalenye zoMgaqo-siseko, akukho mthetho onokuthi ulisikel’umda ilungelo elikuMgaqo-siseko.
Kunokwenziwa isibhengezo sobukho bemeko yequbuliso kuphela ngokoMthetho wePalamente, kunjalonje kuphela xa–

item.p: ubomi besizwe busongelwa yimfazwe, luhlaselo, luvukelo, sisiphithiphithi, yintlekele yendalo okanye yenye imeko yequbuliso echaphazela uluntu; kube
ukwenziwa kwesibhengezo kuyimfuneko ukuze kubuye kubekho uxolo nocwangco.

content.p: Ukubhengezwa kwemeko yequbuliso, kunye nawo nawuphi na umthetho wepalamente owisiweyo okanye elinye inyathelo elithatyathiweyo elisisiphumo sokwenziwa kweso sibhengezo, kunokuqalisa ukusebenza kuphela–

item.p: kwixesha elisengaphambili;

ixesha elingengaphezulu kweentsuku ezingama-21 ukususela kumhla wokwenziwa kwesibhengezo, ngaphandle kokuba iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho igqiba kwelokuba ilolule ixesha lesibhengezo. INdlu inokulolula ixesha lesibhengezo semeko yequbuliso ixesha elingengaphezulu kweenyanga ezintathu ngexesha. Ukolulwa kokuqala kwemeko yequbuliso makube ngesigqibo esamkelwe ngevoti ekuxhasayo oko yesininzi samalungu eNdlu. Nakuphi na ukolulwa okulandelayo emva koko makube ngesigqibo esamkelwe ngevoti ekuxhasayo oko yamalungu eNdlu angama-60 ekhulwini ubuncinane. Isigqibo esingokwesi siqendu sinokwamkelwa kuphela emva kwengxoxo yasesidlangalaleni kwiNdlu.

content.p: Nayiphi na inkundla enegunya lokukwenza oko inokuthath’isigqibo ngokufaneleka–

item.p: kwesibhengezo semeko yequbuliso;
ngokolulwa kwexesha lesibhengezo semeko yequbuliso; okanye
kwawo nawuphi na umthetho wepalamente owisiweyo, okanye elinye inyathelo elithatyathiweyo ngenxa yokubhengezwa kwemeko yequbuliso.

content.p: Nawuphi na umthetho wepalamente owiswe ngenxa yokubhengezwa kwemeko yequbuliso unokutenxa kuMqulu wamaLungelo kuphela ngokwenqanaba–

item.p: elifunwa ngokungqongqo yimeko yequbuliso leyo;
lokuba umthetho wepalamente–
uvisisane neembopheleleko iRiphablikhi enazo ngokomthetho wamazwe ngamazwe osebenza kwiimeko zequbuliso;
uvisisane nesiqendwana (5); kwaye
upapashwe kuShicilelo-Mithetho lukaRhulumente (Government Gazette) lwezwelonke msinya kangangoko kunokwenzeka emva kokuba uwisiwe.

content.p: Akukho Mthetho wePalamente ogunyaza ukubhengezwa kwemeko yequbuliso, kwaye akukho mthetho wepalamente owisiweyo okanye elinye inyathelo elithatyathwe ngenxa yesibhengezo, onokuthi uvumele okanye ugunyaze-

item.p: ukukhululwa kukarhulumente okanye nawuphi na omnye umntu ekuphenduleni ngeziphumo zesenzo esingekho mthethweni;
ukuphambuka kokutshiwo sesi siqendu; okanye
ukuphambuka kwisiqendu esikhankanywe kumhlathi wesiCangca samaLungelo Angenakunyhashwa, ngokwenqanaba eliboniswe kweso siqendu kumhlathi 3 wesiCangca.

content.p: IsiCangca samaLungelo Angenakunyhashwa##

td.p: Ngokumayela nocalulo olungenabulungisa, kuphela xa lulolobuhlanga, lulolwebala, lulolobuzwe okanye lulolwemvelaphi ngokwasentlalweni, lulolwesondo, lulolonqulo okanye ololwimi.
Ngokumayela:- nesiqendwana (1)(d) no-(e);- namalungelo akwisiqendwana (i) nesesi-(ii) kwisiqendwana (1)(g); kunye- nesiqendwana (1)(i) ngokumayela nabantwana abaminyaka ili-15 nangaphantsi.

Ngokumayela:- nesiqendwana (1)(a), (b) no-(c) no-(2)(d);- namalungelo akwisiqendu (a) ukuya ku-(o) kwisiqendwana (3), ngaphandle kwesiqendu (d);- nesiqendwana (4);- nesiqendwana (5) ngokumayela nokungamkelwa kobungqina ukuba ukwamkelwa kwabo kuya kukwenza ukuxoxwa kwetyala kube kokungenabulungisa.

content.p: Nanini na xa umntu evalelwe akwaxoxwa tyala ngenxa yokunyhashwa kwamalungelo okuzalwa kukubhengezwa kwemeko yongxamiseko, makunikelw’ ingqalelo kwimiqathango elandelayo:

item.p: makuqhagamshelwane msinya kangangoko kunokwenzeka nelungu losapho elingumntu omdala okanye umhlobo womntu ovalelweyo, aziswe into yokubaumntu ovalelweyo uvalelwe;

makupapashwe isaziso kuShicilelo-Mithetho LukaRhulumente lwezwelonke zingaphelanga iintsuku ezintlanu evalelwe umntu lowo, kuxelwe igama lomntu ovalelweyo nendawo avalelwe kuyo, kuxelwe nenyathelo lemeko yequbuliso avalelwe ngenxa yalo loo mntu;
umntu ovalelweyo makavunyelwe ukuba azikhethele ugqirha aze atyelelwe nguye nangaliphi na ixesha elifanelekileyo;
umntu ovalelweyo makavunyelwe ukuba azikhethele igqwetha, aze atyelelwe lilo nangaliphi na ixesha elifanelekileyo;

inkundla mayikuqwalasele ngokutsha ukuvalelwa kwakhe msinya kangangoko kunokwenzeka, kodwa kungadanga kuphele iintsuku ezili-10 emva komhla awavalelwa ngawo umntu, kwaye inkundla mayimkhulule umntu ovalelweyo ngaphandle kokuba kuyimfuneko ukumgcina evalelwe ukuze kubuye kubekho uxolo nocwangco;

mntu ovalelweyo ongakhululwanga xa kuqwalaselwa ngokutsha ukuvalelwa kwakhe ngokwesiqendu (e), okanye ongakhululwanga xa kuqwalaselwa ngokutsha ukuvalelwa kwakhe ngokwesi siqendu, unokwenza isicelo enkundleni sokunye kwakhona ukuqwalaselwa ngokutsha kokuvalelwa kwakhe nangaliphi na ixesha emva kokuba ziphelile iintsuku ezili-10 ukususela ekuqwalaselweni ngokutsha kwangaphambili, kwaye inkundla mayimkhulule umntu lowo uvalelweyo ngaphandle kokuba kuseyimfuneko ukumgcina evalelwe ukuze kubuye kubekho uxolo nocwangco;

umntu ovalelweyo makavunyelwe ukuba avele buqu phambi kwayo nayiphi na inkundla eqwalasela ukuvalelwa kwakhe, amelwe ligqwetha koko kuqwalaselwa, kwaye atsho afuna ukukutsho ngokuqhubeka kwakhe evalelwe;

urhulumente makanike inkundla izizathu ezibhaliweyo ezikwenza kuthetheleleke ukuqhubeka kwakhe evalelwe, kwaye makanike umntu ovalelweyo ikopi yezo zizathu ubuncinane kusasele iintsuku ezimbini ngaphambi kokuba inkundla ikuqwalasele ngokutsha ukuvalelwa kwakhe.

content.p: Ukuba inkundla iyamkhulula umntu ovalelweyo, loo mntu akanakuvalelwa kwakhona ngezizathu ezifanayo ngaphandle kokuba urhulumente uqale abonise inkundla isizathu esivakalayo sokumvalela ngokutsha.

Isiqendwana (6) nese-(7) azisebenzi kubantu abangengabo abaseMzantsi-Afrika nabavalelwe ngenxa yongquzulwano lwamazwe ngamazwe kuxhotyiwe. Ndaweni yoko, urhulumente makenze okufunwa yimigaqo enkqamangela iRiphablikhi phantsi komthetho wamazwe ngamazwe wokuboniswa kobuntu ngokumayela nokuvalelwa kwabo bantu.

Nabani na odweliswe kwesi siqendu unelungelo lokuya kwinkundla enegunya elifanelekileyo, esithi ilungelo elikuMqulu wamaLungelo linyhashiwe okanye lisemngciphekweni wokunyhashwa, inokuthi ke inkundla yenze uncedo olufunekayo, oluquka ukuvakaliswa kwamalungelo. Abantu abanokuthi baye enkundleni ngaba–

item.p: nabani na omele isiqu sakhe;
nabani na omele omnye umntu ongakwaziyo yena ukuzimela;
nabani na olilungu leqela elithile labantu okanye omela elo qela ukuba alincede;
nabani na ofuna ukunceda uluntu;
nombutho ofuna ukunceda amalungu awo.

content.p: Xa ichaza intsingiselo yoMqulu wamaLungelo, inkundla, abachopheli-matyala okanye abachopheli-mcimbi–

item.p: mayikhuthaze izithethe ezisisiseko zoluntu olukhululekileyo lwentando yesininzi oluxabise isidima sokuba ngumntu, ukulingana nenkululeko;
mayiqwalasele umthetho wamazwe ngamazwe; kananjalo
isenokuthi iqwalasele umthetho welinye ilizwe.

content.p: Xa zichaza intsingiselo yawo nawuphi na umthetho wepalamente, naxa ziphucula umthetho ongabhalwanga phantsi okanye umthetho wakwantu, zonke iinkundla, abachopheli-matyala okanye abachopheli-mcimbi mabakhuthaze umoya nenjongo yoMqulu wamaLungelo.

UMqulu wamaLungelo awubukhanyeli ubukho bamanye amalungelo okanye iinkululeko ezivunywayo ngumthetho ongabhalwanga phantsi okanye ezifumaneka kuwo, nakumthetho wakwantu okanye kumthetho wepalamente, kuphela nje xa evisisana noMqulu wamaLungelo.

KwiRiphablikhi, urhulumente wahlulahlulwe wangamanqwanqwa, urhulumente welizwe, oorhulumente bamaphondo, noorhulumente basekuhlaleni, bengoorhulumente abazimeleyo, omnye exhomekeke komnye, bekwahlobene.
Onke amanqwanqwa karhulumente makayigcine kwaye anamathele kuyo imigaqo ekwesi Sahluko kwaye makayenze yonke imisebenzi yawo ngokwemida esikwe sesi Sahluko.

section.heading: Imigaqo karhulumente wentsebenziswano nobudlelane phakathi koorhulumente

content.p: Onke amanqwanqwa karhulumente nawo onke amacandelo karhulumente kwinqwanqwa ngalinye–

item.p: makalondoloze uxolo, ubunye bezwelonke nokungabi nakwahlulwa kweRiphablikhi;
makalwele intlalo-ntle yabantu beRiphablikhi;
makabe ngurhulumente osebenza ngempumelelo, osebenzela elubala, ophendulayo, nobumbeneyo weRiphablikhi xa ewonke;
makanyaniseke kuMgaqo-siseko, kwiRiphablikhi nabantu bayo;
makahlonele ubume boMgaqo-siseko, amaziko, amagunya nemisebenzi karhulumente kwamanye amanqwanqwa;
makangathabatheli kuwo naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi ngaphandle kwelo alinikwa ngokoMgaqo-siseko;
makasebenzise amagunya awo, enze nemisebenzi yawo ngendlela engagxuphulekiyo kumhlaba nakwimisebenzi karhulumente okwelinye inqwanqwa; kwaye
makasebenzisane ngokuthembana–
ngokukhuthaza ubudlelane obunobuhlobo;
ngokuncedisana nokuxhasana;
ngokwazisana, nokubonisana, ngemicimbi ebadibanisayo;
ngokulungelelanisa izenzo zawo nemithetho yawo yepalamente;
ngokunamathela kwiinkqubo ekuvunyelenwe ngazo;
nangokukuphepha ukuthabathelana amanyathelo omthetho.

content.p: UMthetho wePalamente–

item.p: mawuseke izakhiwo namaziko okukhuthaza nokwenza lula ubudlelane phakathi koorhulumente; kwaye
makathi gqi namacebo neenkqubo ezifanelekileyo zokwenza lula ukulungiswa kweembambano eziphakathi koorhulumente.

content.p: Icandelo likarhulumente elibandakanyeke kwimbambano ephakathi koorhulumente malenze onke amatiletile afanelekileyo okuyizinzisa loo mbambano ngokusebenzisa amacebo neenkqubo ezikholo loo njongo, kwaye maliwasebenzise liwagqibe onke amanye amacebo ngaphambi kokuba libhenele enkundleni ukusombulula imbambano.
Ukuba inkundla ayanelisekanga kwinto yokuba kuhlangatyezwene neemfuneko zesiqendwana (3), isenokuyibuyisela imbambano emva kumacandelo karhulumente abandakanyekileyo.
IPalamente–

item.p: yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho;
neBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke.

content.p: INdlu yoWiso-mthetho kunye neBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke zithabath’ inxaxheba kwinkqubo yowiso-mthetho ngendlela echazwe kuMgaqo-siseko.

INdlu yoWiso-mthetho inyulelwe ukumela abantu nokuqinisekisa ukulawula kwabantu phantsi koMgaqo-siseko. Ikwenza oku ngokukhetha uMongameli, ngokuba liqonga lezwelonke lokugwadlwa kwemicimbi esidlangalaleni, ngokuphumeza imithetho nangokuphonononga izenzo zikarhulumente.

IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke limela amaphondo ukuqinisekisa ukuba izinto ezichaphazela amaphondo zithathelw’ingqalelo kurhulumente wezwelonke. Likwenza oku ikakhulu ngokuthabath’inxaxheba kwinkqubo yowiso-mthetho yezwelonke nangokuba liqonga lezwelonke lokugwadlwa esidlangalaleni kwemicimbi echaphazela amaphondo.
UMongameli usenokuthi nangaliphi na ixesha abize iPalamente ukuba ihlale ngexesha elingelilo elokuhlala kwayo ukuze yenze imisebenzi ekhethekileyo.
Ikomkhulu lePalamente liseKapa, kodwa uMthetho wePalamente owiswe ngokwesiqendu 76(1) nese-(5) usenokuthi ikomkhulu lePalamente malibe kwenye indawo.
KwiRiphablikhi, igunya lokuwis’umthetho–

item.p: lorhulumente wezwelonke likwiPalamente, njengoko kuchazwe kwisiqendu 44;
loorhulumente bamaphondo, likwizindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo, njengoko kuchazwe kwisiqendu 104; lize
eloorhulumente basekuhlaleni libe kumaBhunga ooMasipala, njengoko kuchazwe kwisiqendu 156.

content.p: Igunya lowiso-mthetho lezwelonke njengoko likwiPalamente–

item.p: lithi jize kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho igunya–
lokwenza utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko;

lokuphumeza imithetho ngawo nawuphi na umcimbi, kuquka nomcimbi okummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4, kodwa, ngokulawulwa sisiqendwana (2), awuqukwanga umcimbi okummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 5;
nelokuphathisa amagunya okuwis’umthetho iwaphathisa naliphisa na iqumrhu lowiso-mthetho elikwelinye inqwanqwa likarhulumente, ngaphandle kwegunya lokwenz’utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko; kwaye
lithi jize kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke igunya–
lokuthabath’inxaxheba ekwenzen’utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko ngokwesiqendu 74;
lokuphumeza, ngokwesiqendu 76, imithetho ngawo nawuphi na umcimbi owela kummandla wentsebenzo okwiSihlomelo 4 nangawo nawuphi na umcimbi ofunwa nguMgaqo-siseko ukuba uphunyezwe ngokwesiqendu 76;
nelokuqwalasela, ngokwesiqendu 75, nawuphi na omnye umthetho ophunyezwe yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho.

content.p: IPalamente inokuthi, ngokuphumez’umthetho ngokwesiqendu 76(1), ingenelele kuwo nawuphi na umcimbi owela kummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 5, xa kuyimfuneko–

item.p: ukuze kukhuseleke ilizwe;
ukuze kubekho ubunye kuqoqosho;
ukuze kubekho imilinganiselo eyimfuneko yezwelonke;
ukuze kubekho imilinganiselo esisiseko efunekayo ukuze kunikezelwe ngeenkonzo; okanye
ukuthintela isenzo esingabhadlanga esenziwa liphondo esithi sibe nobungozi kwelinye iphondo okanye elizweni lonke.

content.p: Imithetho yepalamente engomcimbi oyimfuneko ukuze lisetyenziswe ngokuphumelelayo igunya ngawo nawuphi na umcimbi odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4, iyimithetho engomcimbi odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4.
Xa isebenzisa igunya layo lowiso-mthetho, iPalamente inkqanyangelwa kuphela nguMgaqo-siseko, kwaye imele yenze ngokoMgaqo-siseko, nangokwemida eyisikelwa nguMgaqo-siseko.

INdlu yoWiso-mthetho kunye neBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke mabaseke ikomiti yemigaqo yendibaniselwano ukuze iqulunqe imigaqo nemiyalelo ngemicimbi eyindibaniselwano yeNdlu neyeBhunga, kuquka nemigaqo nemiyalelo–

item.p: yokwenza isigqibo ngeenkqubo zokwenza lula inkqubo yowiso-mthetho, kuquka nokubek’umda kwixesha lokuqukumbela naliphi na inyathelo kwinkqubo;

yokuseka iikomiti zendibaniselwano ezinabameli abavela kokubini kwiNdlu nakwiBhunga ukuze ziqwalasele iMithetho eYilwayo ukuze zenze ingxelo ngayo, ekuyiMithetho eYilwayo ekuthethwe ngayo kwisiqendu 74 nesama-75 ethi ibhekiswe kuloo komiti;
yokuseka ikomiti yendibaniselwano yokuqwalasela ngokutsha uMgaqo-siseko ubuncinane qho ngonyaka;
neyokulawula imicimbi–
yekomiti yemigaqo yendibaniselwano;
yeKomiti yoLamlo;
yekomiti yokuqwalaselwa ngokutsha koMgaqo-siseko; kunye
nazo naziphi na iikomiti zendibaniselwano ezisekwe ngokwesiqendu (b).

content.p: Amalungu eKhabhinethi, namalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho kunye nabathunywa kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke banamalungelo afanayo nokungabi nakubekwa tyala okufanayo phambi kwekomiti yendibaniselwano yeNdlu neyeBhunga kanye njengokuba benaloo malungelo phambi kweNdlu okanye phambi kweBhunga.
INdlu yoWiso-mthetho inabantu ababhinqileyo nabangamadoda abangekho abangekho ngaphantsi kwama-350 kodwa bengekho ngaphezulu kwama-4000 abanyulwe njengamalungu ngokwenkqubo yonyulo–

item.p: efunwa ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke;
esekelwe kumqulu wabavoti wezwelonke;
ethi eyona minyaka yobudala iphantsi yokuvota mayibe li-18;
eyenza ukuba, ngokubanzi, kubekho ukumelwa ngokulinganayo.

content.p: UMthetho wePalamente mawuxele indlela yokuqingqa inani lamalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) senziwa utshintsho sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003 nasisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesihlanu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Wonke ummi ofanelekayo ukuba avotele iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho uyafaneleka ukuba abe lilungu leNdlu, ngaphandle–

item.p: komntu oqeshwe ngurhulumente, okanye osebenzela urhulumente, kwaye efumana umvuzo ngoko kuqeshwa okanye ngoko kumsebenzela, engenguye–
uMongameli, uSekela-Mongameli, aBaphathiswa nooSekela- Mphathiswa;
abasezikhundleni abamisebenzi yabo ihambelanayo nemisebenzi yelungu leNdlu, kwaye ibe loo misebenzi ivakaliswe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ihambelana nemisebenzi yelungu leNdlu;
abangengabo abathunywa abasisigxina kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke okanye abangengawo amalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo okanye eBhunga likaMasipala;
abangengabo abavakaliswe yinkundla bengakwazi ukuwahlawula amatyala abo kwaye bengekaphumi kuloo meko;
ongenguye ovakaliswe yinkundla yeRiphablikhi engongaphilanga engqondweni; okanye

ongenguye othe, emva kokuba esi siqendu siqalise ukusebenza, wafunyaniswa enetyala lokwaphul’umthetho waza wagwetywa ixesha elingaphezu kweenyanga ezili-12 entolongweni engakhethiswanga fayini, nokuba kulapha kwiRiphablikhi okanye kungaphandle kweRiphablikhi, ukuba isenzo esikukwaphul’umthetho besiya kuba kukwaphul’umthetho kwiRiphablikhi, kodwa akukho mntu onokuthathwa njengogwetyiweyo de kube kwenziwe isigqibo ngesibheno sakhe nxamnye nokufunyaniswa kwakhe enetyala okanye nxamnye nesigwebo sakhe, okanye de libe ixesha lokubhena liphelile. Ukungafaneleki okutshiwo sesi siqendu kuphela emva kweminyaka emihlanu sigqityiwe isigwebo.

content.p: Umntu ongafanelekiyo ukuba abe lilungu leNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ngokwesiqendwana (1)(a) okanye (b) unokuzigqatsela ukuba kwiNdlu, kodwa ke ngokulawulwa yimida okanye yimiqathango ebekwe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Umntu uyalahlekelwa bubulungu beNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba–

item.p: uyayeka ukuba ngofanelekayo; okanye
uthi angabikho kwiNdlu ngaphandle kwemvume kwiimeko ethi imigaqo nemiyalelo yeNdlu iyalele ukuba makalahlekelwe bubulungu; okanye
uyayeka ukuba lilungu lombutho owamchongayo loo mntu ukuba abe lilungu leNdlu yoWiso-mthetho.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 2 soMthetho Weshumi Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003 nasisiqendu 2 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesihlanu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Izithuba ezikhoyo kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho mazivalwe ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke .

Ngaphambi kokuba amalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho aqalise ukwenza imisebenzi yawo kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, makathabathe isifungo okanye enze isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nesokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokweSihlomelo 2.
INdlu yoWiso-mthetho inyulelwa ixesha eliyiminyaka emihlanu.

Ukuba iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ithi ichithwe ngokwesiqendu 50, okanye xa kuphela ixesha layo, uMongameli makathi, ngokwenza isihlokomiso, amemelele ukuba kubekho unyulo aze axele imihla yalo, lunyulo olo omalubekho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90 ukususela kumhla eyachithwa ngawo iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho okanye ukususela kumhla wokuphela kwexesha layo. Isihlokomiso esimemelela unyulo nesixela imihla yalo sinokukhutshwa ngaphambi kokuphela kwexesha leNdlu yoWiso-mthetho okanye emva kokuphela kwalo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Wesihlanu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-1999.]

content.p: Ukuba isiphumo sonyulo lweNdlu yoWiso-mthetho asibhengezwa lo gama kuselixesha elimiselwe ngokwesiqendu 190, okanye ukuba unyulo luthi luphuthiswe yinkundla, uMongameli makathi, ngokwenza isihlokomiso, amemelele olunye unyulo aze axele imihla yalo, lunyulo olo omalubekho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90 ukususela ekupheleni kwelo xesha okanye ukususela kumhla olwathi unyulo lwaphuthiswa ngawo.
INdlu yoWiso-mthetho iqhubeka inako ukusebenza ukususela kwixesha echithwa ngalo okanye ukususelwa kwixesha lokuphelelwa kwayo, kude kube yimini eyandulela usuku lokuqala lokuvotela iNdlu elandelayo.

section.heading: Ukuchithwa kweNldu yoWiso-mthetho ngaphambi kokuphela kwexesha layo

content.p: UMongameli makayichithe iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba–

item.p: iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yamkele isigqibo sokuyichitha ngevoti exhasayo yesininzi samalungu ayo; naxa
kudlule iminyaka emithathu ukususela ekunyulweni kweNdlu.

content.p: UMongameli oBambeleyo makayichithe iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba–

item.p: kukho isithuba kwisikhundla sikaMongameli; naxa
iNdlu ingamnyulanga uMongameli omtsha kwisithuba seentsuku ezingama-30 sidalekile isithuba eso.

content.p: Emva konyulo, ukuhlala kokuqala kweNdlu yoWiso-mthetho makube ngexesha nangomhla ogqitywe yiJaji eyiNtloko, kodwa zingade ziphele iintsuku ezili-14 sibhengeziwe isiphumo sonyulo. INdlu inokuzenzela isigqibo ngexesha nangobude bexesha lokunye ukuhlala kwayo nangamaxesha ayo ekhefu.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: UMongameli unokuthi nangaliphi na ixesha abize iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba ihlale ngexesha elingelilo lokuhlala ukuze yenze imisebenzi ekhethekileyo.
Ukuhlala kweNdlu yoWiso-mthetho kwiindawo ezingelilo ikomkhulu lePalamente kuvumeleke kuphela ngezizathu zokunced’uluntu, zokhuseleko okanye ukufaneleka, naxa kuvunyelwa yimigaqo nayimiyalelo yeNdlu.

Ekuhlanganeni kwayo okokuqala emva kokunyulwa, okanye xa kufuneka kuvalwe Ekuhlaleni kwayo kokuqala emva konyulo, okanye xa kuyimfuneko ukuvala isithuba, iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho mayinyule uSihlalo noSekela-Sihlalo kumalungu ayo.
IJaji eyiNtloko mayongamele ukunyulwa kukaSihlalo, okanye ichonge enye ijaji ukuba ikwenze oko. USihlalo yena wongamela ukunyulwa kukaSekela-Sihlalo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 2 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Inkqubo echazwe kwiCandelo A leSihlomelo 3 isebenza ekunyulweni kukaSihlalo noSekela-Sihlalo.
INdlu yoWiso-mthethho inokumshenxisa esikhundleni uSihlalo okanye uSekela- Sihlalo ngokuthath’isigqibo. Makubekho isininzi samalungu eNdlu xa kusamkelwa eso sigqibo.
Ngokwemigaqo yayo nemiyalelo, iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho isenokunyula kumalungu ayo amanye amagosa okongamela ukuba ancedise uSihlalo noSekela-Sihlalo.
Ngaphandle kwaxa uMgaqo-siseko utsho okwahlukileyo–

item.p: makubekho isininzi samalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ngaphambi kokuba kuvotelwe uMthetho oYilwayo okanye uMthetho oYilwayo wokwenz’ utshintsho;
makubekho ubuncinane isinye kwisithathu samalungu ngaphambi kokuba kuvotelwe nawuphi na omnye umbandela ophambi kweNdlu; kananjalo
yonke imibandela ephambi kweNdlu igqitywa ngesininzi seevoti.

content.p: Ilungu leNdlu yoWiso-mthetho elongameleyo kwintlanganiso yeNdlu alinakuthabath’inxaxheba kwiingxoxo, kodwa–

item.p: malivote kwivoti yokwenz’isigqibo xa iivoti zilingana macala kumbandela okhoyo; kwaye
linokuthabath’inxaxheba kwiingxoxo xa umbandela oxoxwayo kufuneka ugqitywe ngevoti yesibini kwisithathu ubuncinane samalungu eNdlu.

section.heading: Amalungelo amalungu athile eKhabhinethi nooSekela-Mphathiswa kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho

content.p: UMongameli, kunye nalo naliphi na ilungu leKhabhinethi okanye uSekela-Mphathiswa ongelilo ilungu leNdlu yoWiso-mthetho unokuthi, ngokulawulwa yimigaqo nayimiyalelo yeNdlu, abekho kwaye athethe kwiNdlu, kodwa akavumelekanga ukuba avote.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 54 sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 3 soMthetho Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Ekusebenziseni igunya layo lokuwis’imithetho, iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho–

item.p: inokuqwalasela nawuphi na umthetho ophambi kweNdlu, iwuphumeze, yenze utshintsho kuwo okanye iwukhabe; kwaye
inokuwuqalisa ngokwayo umthetho okanye iwulungiselele, ngaphandle kweMithetho eYilwayo yemali.

content.p: INdlu yoWiso-mthetho mayithi gqi namacebo–

item.p: okuqinisekisa ukuba onke amacandelo karhulumente akulawulo kurhulumente wezwelonke ayaphendula kuyo;
nawokuba liliso–
ekusetyenzisweni kwegunya lokulawula kwizwelonke, kuquka nokwenziwa kwemithetho isebenze;
nakulo naliphi na icandelo likarhulumente.

section.heading: Ubungqina okanye ingcombolo phambi kweNdlu yoWiso-mthetho

content.p: INdlu yoWiso-Mthetho okanye nayiphi na ikomiti kwiikomiti zayo-

item.p: inokubiza nawuphi na umntu ukuba avele phambi kwayo ukuze anike ubungqina efungile okanye enze isibhambathiso sokutheth’inyaniso, okanye avelise amaxwebhu;
isenokufuna ukuba nawuphi na umntu okanye iziko lenze ingxelo kuyo;
isenokunyanzela nawuphi na umntu okanye umbutho ngokomthetho wezwelonke okanye ngokwemigaqo nemiyalelo, ukuba athobele umsila wengwe okanye enze okufunwayo ngokwesiqendu (a) okanye (b); kwaye
isenokwamkela izicelo okanye okuvela nakuwuphi na umntu ochaphazelekayo okanye imibutho echaphazelekayo.

content.p: INdlu yoWiso-mthetho-

item.p: inokwenza izigqibo ngamalungiselelo ayo angaphakathi nangeenkqubo zayo ize izilawule; kananjalo
inokwenza imigaqo nemiyalelo ngemicimbi yayo, ikwenza oko ikhumbula intando yesininzi yokumelwa kwabantu nokuthabath’inxaxheba kwabo, ukuphendula, ukusebenzela elubala, nokubandakanyeka koluntu.

content.p: Imigaqo nemiyalelo yeNdlu yoWiso-mthetho mayixele–

item.p: ukuba zisekwa njani, zakhiwe njani, iikomiti zayo, ayintoni amagunya azo, nemisebenzi yazo, neenkqubo zazo nobude bexesha lobukho;
ukuthabath’inxaxheba kwamaqela amancinane amelweyo kwiNdlu, ethabath’ inxaxheba kwiinkqubo zeNdlu nakwiikomiti zayo, ngendlela evisisana nentando yesininzi;
uncedo lwemali nololawulo kwiqela ngalinye elimelweyo kwiNdlu ngokulingana nokumelwa kwalo, ukuze iqela elo nenkokeli yalo liyenze imisebenzi yalo kwiNdlu ngempumelelo; kananjalo
nokwamkelwa kwenkokeli yelona qela likhulu liphikisayo kwiNdlu njengeNkokeli yeQela Eliphikisayo.

content.p: Amalungu eKhabhinethi, ooSekela-Mphathiswa namalungu eNdlu yoWiso- mthetho–

item.p: anenkululeko yokuthetha kwiNdlu nakwiikomiti zayo, kodwa ke ngokulawulwa yimigaqo nayimiyalelo yayo; kwaye
akanakumangalelwa ngetyala lembambano okanye lolwaphulo-mthetho, abanjwe, avalelwe entolongweni okanye afunw’imbuyekezo ngomonakalo odalwe-
yiyo nayiphi na into ayithethileyo kwiNdlu okanye ayivelisa phambi kwayo okanye kwiikomiti zayo; okanye
yiyo nayiphi na into ethe yatyhileka ngenxa yento ayithethileyo kwiNdlu, okanye ayivelisa phambi kwayo okanye kwiikomiti zayo.

content.p: Ezinye izinto engenakubekwa tyala ngazo iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, amalungu eKhabhinethi namalungu eNdlu zinokutshiwo ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Imivuzo, iimalana ezisecaleni namaqithiqithi ahlawulwa amalungu eNdlu yoWiso- mthetho ziimali ezitsalwa ngqo kwiNgxowa-mali yeNgeniso yeLizwe.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 58 senziwa utshintsho sisiqendu 4 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

section.heading: Ukungena koluntu kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho nokubandakanyeka kwalo

content.p: INdlu yoWiso-mthetho–

item.p: mayenze ukuba uluntu lubandakanyeke kwiinkqubo zowiso-mthetho nakwezinye iinkqubo zendlu nezeekomiti zayo; kwaye
mayiwenze umsebenzi wayo elubala, iintlanganiso zayo, nezeekomiti zayo, zibe selubala, kodwa ke kusenokuthatyathwa amanyathelo afanelekileyo–
okukulawula ukungena koluntu, kuquka nokungena kwamajelo eendaba, kwiNdlu nakwiikomiti zayo; nawokuba
asetshwe umntu kwaye, xa kufanelekile, alelwe ukuba angene okanye akhutshwe.

content.p: INdlu yoWiso-mthetho ayivumelekanga ukuba ilwalele uluntu, kuquka namajelo eendaba, ukungena kwintlanganiso yekomiti, ngaphandle kokuba kufanelekile kwaye kuyathetheleleka ukwenza njalo kuluntu olukhululekileyo lwentando yesininzi.
IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke linegqiza elinye labathunywa abalishumi abavela kwiphondo ngalinye.
Aba bathunywa balishumi–

item.p: ngabathunywa abane abakhethekileyo–

abayiNkulumbuso yephondo okanye, ukuba iNkulumbuso ayifumaneki, naliphi na ilungu leNdlu yoWiso-mthetho yephondo elichongwe yiNkulumbuso ilichongela yonke imisebenzi okanye umsebenzi othile okhethekileyo ophambi kweBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke; kunye
nabanye abathunywa abathathu abakhethekileyo
nabathunywa abathandathu abasisigxina abamiselwe ngokwesiqendu 61(2).

content.p: Igqiza likhokelwa yiNkulumbuso yephondo okanye, ukuba iNkulumbuso ayifumaneki, likhokelwe lilungu legqiza lephondo elichongwe yiNkulumbuso.
Amaqela amelweyo kwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo anelungelo lokuba nabathunywa kwigqiza lephondo ngokwendlela echazwe kwiCandelo B leSihlomelo 3.

item.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo mayithi, zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 sibhengeziwe isiphumo sonyulo saloo ndlu yowiso-mthetho-

ithathe isigqibo, ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke, sokuba ngabathunywa abangaphi kubathunywa bombutho ngamnye abaza kuba ngabathunywa abasisigxina, bebangaphi abaza kuba ngabathunywa abakhethekileyo;
ize imisele abathunywa abasisigxina ngokokuchonga okwenziwe ngamaqela.

p.remark: [Isiqendu (b) sitsityiwe ngokokutsho kwesiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesine Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]
[Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Wethoba Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2002 nasisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesine Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendwana (2)(a) mawuqinisekise ukuthabath’inxaxheba kwamaqela amancinane kokubini kubathunywa abasisigxina nabakhethekileyo begqiza ngendlela evisisana nentando yesininzi.

Indlu yowiso-mthetho, ngokuvumelana neNkulumbuso neenkokeli zamaqela anelungelo lokuba nabathunywa abakhethekileyo kwigqiza lephondo mayichonge abathunywa abakhethekileyo, njengoko kuman’ukufuneka ngamaxesh’athile, iwachonga kumalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho.
Umntu ochongiweyo ukuba abe ngumthunywa osisigxina makabe ngofanelekileyo ukuba abe lilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo.
Ukuba umntu olilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo umiselwe njengomthunywa osisigxina, loo mntu uyayeka ukuba lilungu lendlu yowiso- mthetho.
Abathunywa abasisigxina bamiselwa ukuba babe ngabo ixesha eliphela-

item.p: ngaphambi nje kokuhlala kokuqala kwendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo emva konyulo lwayo olulandelayo.

p.remark: [Isiqendu (b) sitsityiwe ngokokutsho kwesiqendu 2 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesine Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

[Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 2 soMthetho Wethoba Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2002 saza kwakhoa sathatyathelw’indawo soMthetho Weshumi Elinesine Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Umntu uyayeka ukuba ngumthunywa osisigxina ukuba–

item.p: uthi angafaneleki ukuba lilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ngaso nasiphi na isizathu esingekuko ukumiselwa njengomthunywa osisigxina;
uba lilungu leKhabhinethi;
akasathenjwa yindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo uze umbutho owamchongayo uthi makabuye;
uyayeka ukuba lilungu lombuthho owamchongayo uze loo mbutho uthi makabuye; okanye
uthi angabikho kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke ngaphandle kwemvume kwiimeko ethi kuyo imigaqo nemiyalelo yeBhunga ifunise ukuba alahlekelwe sisikhundla sokuba ngumthunywa osisigxina.

content.p: Izithuba ezikhoyo kubathunywa abasisigxina mazivalwe ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

Ngaphambi kokuba abathunywa abasisigxina baqalise ukwenza imisebenzi yabo kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, mabafunge okanye benze isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nesokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokweSihlomelo 2.
IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke linokwenz’isigqibo ngexesha nangobude bexesha lokuhlala kwalo namaxesha alo ekhefu.
UMongameli usenokuthi nangaliphi na ixesha abize iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke ukuba lihlale ngexesha elingelilo elokuhlala ukuze lenze imisebenzi ekhethekileyo.

Ukuhlala kweBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke kwiindawo ezizezinye ezingelilo ikomkhulu lePalamente kuvumeleke kuphela ngezizathu ezizezokunced’uluntu, ukhuseleko okanye ukufaneleka, naxa kuvunyelwa yimigaqo nayimiyalelo yeBhunga.
IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke malinyule uSihlalo nooSekela-Sihlalo ababini kubathunywa balo.
USihlalo nomnye wooSekela-Sihlalo banyulwa kubathunywa abasisigxina iminyaka emihlanu ngaphandle kokuba amaxesha abo okuba ngabathunywa aphela ngaphambi koko.
Omnye uSekela-Sihlalo unyulelwa ixesha elingunyaka omnye, ize ke indawo yakhe ithatyathwe ngumthunywa ovela kwelinye iphondo, ngaloo ndlela iphondo ngalinye lifumane ukumelwa.
IJaji eyiNtloko mayongamele ukunyulwa kukaSihlalo, kungenjalo ichonge enye ijaji ukuba ikwenze oko. USihlalo yena wongamela ukunyulwa kooSekela-Sihlalo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (4) sathatyathelw’indawo sisqendu 5 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshinstho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Inkqubo echazwe kwiCandelo A leSihlomelo 3 iyasebenza ekunyulweni kukaSihlalo nooSekela-Sihlalo.
IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke linokumshenxisa uSihlalo okanye uSekela-Sihlalo esikhundleni.
Ngokwemigaqo nemiyalelo yalo, iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke lisenokunyula kubathunywa amanye amagosa awongamelayo ukuba ancedise uSihlalo nooSekela-Sihlalo.
Ngaphandle kokuba uMgaqo-siseko utsho okwahlukileyo–

item.p: iphondo ngalinye livota kube kanye, kuvota oko okwenziwa egameni lephondo, kusenziwa yintloko yegqiza lalo; kwaye
yonke imibandela ephambi kweBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke sukuba kuvunyelwene ngayo xa ubuncinane emahlanu amaphondo avota evumelana naloo mbandela.

content.p: UMthetho wePalamente owiswe ngokwenkqubo yesiqendwana (1) okanye yesi-(2) kwisiqendu 76, mawuxele inkqubo engumfaniselwano ekuthi ngayo izindlu zowiso- mthetho zamaphondo zigunyaze amagqiza azo ukuba avote egameni lazo.
Amalungu eKhabhinethi kunye nooSekela-Mphathiswa banokubakho, kunjalonje bathethe, kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, kodwa abavumelekanga ukuba bavote.

IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke lisenokufuna ukuba ilungu leKhabhinethi, uSekela-Mphathiswa okanye igosa elikurhulumente wezwelonke okanye elikurhulumente wephondo libekho kwintlanganiso yeBhunga okanye kwikomiti yeBhunga.

Abameli abangxungxileyo abangekho ngaphezu kweshumi abachongwe ngurhulumente wasekuhlaleni ocwangcisiweyo ngokwesiqendu 163 ukuba bamele iindidi ngeendidi zoomasipala banokuthi, xa kuyimfuneko, bathabath’inxaxheba kokwenziwa liBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, kodwa abavumelekanga ukuba bavote.
Ekusebenziseni igunya lalo lokuwis’umthetho, iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke–

item.p: lisenokuqwalasela, liphumeze, lenz’utshintsho, licebise ukuba kwenziwe utshintsho kuwo nawuphi na umthetho ophambi kweBhunga okanye liwukhabe, ngokuvumelana nesi Sahluko; kwaye

lisenokuwuqalisa ngokwalo umthetho okanye liwulungiselele, kungumthetho owela kummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4 okanye omnye umthetho ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendu 76(3), kodwa alivumelekanga ukuba liqalise iMithetho eYilwayo yemali okanye liyilungiselele.

section.heading: Ubungqina okanye ingcombolo phambi kweBhunga leZwelonke

content.p: IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke okanye iikomiti zalo–

item.p: lisenokubiza nawuphi na umntu ukuba avele phambi kwalo aze kunika ubungqina efungile okanye enze isibhambathiso sokutheth’inyaniso okanye aze kuvelisa amaxwebhu—
lisengafuna naliphi na iziko okanye umntu ukuba enze ingxelo kulo;

lisenganyanzelisa nawuphi na umntu okanye iziko, ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke okanye ngokwemigaqo nemiyalelo, ukuba athobele umsila wengwe okanye enze okufunwayo ngokwesiqendu (a) okanye (b); kwaye
lisenokwamkela izicelo, okutshiwo ngabantu abachaphazelekayo okanye imibutho echaphazelekayo.

content.p: IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke–

item.p: lisenokwenz’isigqibo ngamalungiselelo angaphakathi, nangeenkqubo zalo lize lizilawule; kwaye
lisenokuqulunqa imigaqo nemiyalelo engemisebenzi yalo, kucingelwa intando yesininzi yokumelwa nokuthabath’inxaxheba, ukuphendula, ukusebenzela elubala nokubandakanyeka koluntu.

content.p: Imigaqo nemiyalelo yeBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke mayithethe–

item.p: ngokusekwa kweekomiti zalo, iindlela ezakhiwe ngayo, amagunya azo, imisebenzi yazo, iinkqubo zalo nobude bexesha bazo;
ngokuthabath’inxaxheba kwawo amaphondo koko ikwenzayo ngokuvisisana nentando yesininzi;

nangokuthabath’inxaxheba kwamaqela amancinane amelweyo kwiBhunga, ethabath’inxaxheba kokwenziwayo liBhunga naziikomiti zalo, ngendlela evisisana nentando yesininzi, nanini na xa umcimbi uza kugqitywa ngokwesiqendu 75.

content.p: Abathunywa kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke nabantu ekuthethwe ngabo kwisiqendu 66 nesama-67–

item.p: banenkululeko yokuthetha kwiBhunga nakwiikomiti zalo, kodwa ke ngokulawulwa yimigaqo nayimiyalelo yalo; kwaye
abanakumangalelwa ngetyala lembambano okanye lolwaphulo-mthetho, babanjwe, bavalelwe entolongweni okanye bafunw’imbuyekezo ngomonakalo odalwe–
yiyo nayiphi na into abayithethileyo kwiBhunga, okanye bayivelisa phambi kwayo okanye kwiikomiti zalo; okanye
yiyo nayiphi na into ethe yatyhileka ngenxa yento abayithethileyo kwiBhunga okanye bayivelisa phambi kwalo okanye kwiikomiti zalo.

content.p: Ezinye izinto elingenakubekwa tyala ngazo iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, abathunywa kwiBhunga, nabantu ekuthethwe ngabo kwisiqendu 66 nesama-67 zinokutshiwo ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Imivuzo, iimalana ezisecaleni namaqithiqithi ahlawulwa amalungu asisigxina eBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke ziimali ezitsalwa ngqo kwiNgxowa-mali yeNgeniso yeLizwe.

section.heading: Ukubakho koluntu nokuthabath’ inxaxheba kwalo kwiBhunga leZwelonke

content.p: IBhunga lePhondo leZwelonke–

item.p: malenze ukuba uluntu lubandakanyeke kwiinkqubo zowiso-mthetho nakwezinye iinkqubo zeBhunga nezeekomiti zalo; kwaye
maliwenze umsebenzi walo elubala, iintlanganiso zalo, nezeekomiti zalo, zibe selubala, kodwa ke kusenokuthatyathwa amanyathelo afanelekileyo–
okukulawula ukungena koluntu, kuquka nokungena kwamajelo eendaba, kwiBhunga neekomiti zalo; nawokuba
asetshwe umntu kwaye, xa kufanelekile, alelwe ukuba angene okanye akhutshwe.

content.p: IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke alivumelekanga ukuba lilwalele uluntu , kuquka namajelo eendaba, ukungena kwintlanganiso yekomiti, ngaphandle kokuba kufanelekile kwaye kuyathetheleleka ukwenza njalo kuluntu olukhululekileyo lwentando yesininzi.
Nawuphi na uMthetho oYilwayo unokungeniswa kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho.

Kuphela lilungu leKhabhinethi okanye uSekela-Mphathiswa, okanye ilungu lekomiti yeNdlu yoWiso-mthetho elinokuthi lingenise uMthetho oYilwayo kwiNdlu, kodwa kuphela lilungu leKhabhinethi eliphathiswe imicimbi yemali yezwelonke elinokungenisa le Mithetheo iYilwayo ilandelayo kwiNdlu:

item.p: uMthetho oYilwayo wemali; okanye
uMthetho oYilwayo omayela nomthetho wepalamente ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendu 214.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1(a) soMthetho Wesixhenxe Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Umthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendu 76(3), ngaphandle koMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendwana (2)(a) okanye (b) kwesi siqendu, unokungeniswa kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1(b) soMthetho Wesixhenxe Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Kuphela lilungu leBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke okanye ikomiti yalo enokuthi ingenise uMthetho oYilwayo kwiBhunga.
UMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho mawuthunyelwe kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke ukuba kufuneka uqwalaselwe liBhunga. UMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe liBhunga mawuthunyelwe kwiNdlu.
Isiqendu 1 kunye nesi siqendwana zinokwenziwa utshintsho nguMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe–

item.p: yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yama-75 ekhulwini kumalungu ayo;
naliBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yamaphondo amathandathu.

content.p: ISahluko 2 sinokwenziwa utshintsho nguMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe–

item.p: yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo;
naliBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yamaphondo amathandathu.

content.p: Nakuphi na okunye okutshiwo nguMgaqo-siseko kunokwenziwa utshintsho nguMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe–

item.p: yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu kumalungu ayo;
naliBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yamaphondo amathandathu, ukuba utshintsho olo–
luphathelele kumcimbi ochaphazela iBhunga;
luguqula imida yamaphondo, amagunya, imisebenzi okanye amaziko; okanye
lwenz’utshintsho kokumayela nomcimbi wamaphondo.

content.p: UMthetho oYilwayo owenz’utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko awuvumelekanga ukuba uqulathe izinto ezingelulo utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko nemicimbi engenanto yakwenza notshintsho.
Ubuncinane kusasele iintsuku ezingama-30 ngaphambi kokuba uMthetho oYilwayo owenz’utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko ungeniswe ngokwesiqendu 73(2), umntu okanye ikomiti eceba ukungenisa loo Mthetho uYilwayo–

item.p: mayipapashe kuShicilelo-Mithetho LukaRhulumente lwezwelonke iinkcukacha zotshintsho olucetywayo ukuze uluntu luvakalise izimvo, ikwenza okongokuvumelana nemigaqo nemiyalelo yeNdlu yoWiso-mthetho;
mayingenise ezo nkcukacha kwizindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo ukuze kufumaneke izimvo zazo, ikwenza oko ngokwemigaqo nemiyalelo yeNdlu; kwaye

mayingenise ezo nkcukacha kwiBhunga ukuze kuxoxwe esidlangalaleni, ikwenza oko ngokwemigaqo nemiyalelo yeBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, ukuba utshintsho olucetywayo asilotshintsho ekufuneka luphunyezwe liBhunga.

content.p: Xa uMthetho oYilwayo owenz’utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko ungeniswa, umntu okanye ikomiti ewungenisayo uMthetho oYilwayo lowo makangenise izimvo ezibhaliweyo ezifunyenwe eluntwini nakwizindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo-

item.p: zingeniswe kuSihlalo ukuze zithiwe thaca kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho; kuze kuthi
ukuba lutshintsho ekuthethwe ngalo kwisiqendwana (1), (2), okanye (3)(b), zingeniswe kuSihlalo weBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke ukuze zithiwe thaca kwiBhunga.

content.p: Umthetho oYilwayo owenz’utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko akuvumelekanga ukuba mawuvotelwe kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 -

item.p: zokungeniswa kwawo, ukuba iNdlu ihleli xa uMthetho oYilwayo lowo ungeniswa; okanye
zokuthiwa thaca kwawo kwiNdlu, ukuba iNdlu ikwikhefu xa uMthetho oYilwayo lowo ungeniswa.

content.p: Ukuba uMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (3)(b), okanye nayiphi na inxalenye yoMthetho oYilwayo, ingephondo elithile kuphela okanye amaphondo athile kuphela, iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke alivumelekanga ukuba liwuphumeze loo Mthetho uYilwayo okanye iinxalenye zawo ngaphandle kokuba oko kuvunywe yindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo echaphazelekayo okanye zizindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo ezichaphazelekayo.
UMthetho oYilwayo owenz’utshintsho kuMgaqo-siseko ophunyezwe yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho naliBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, apho kufanelekileyo, mawuthunyelwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume.

Xa iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho iphumeza uMthetho oYilwayo ongenguwo uMthetho oYilwayo ekusebenza kuwo inkqubo echazwe kwisiqendu 74 okanye 76, loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawuthunyelwe kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke uze uqhutywe ngokwenkqubo elandelayo:

item.p: IBhunga–
maliwuphumeze loo Mthetho uYilwayo;
maliwuphumeze loo Mthetho uYilwayo ngomqathango wokuba kuphunyezwe notshintsho olucetywa lilo; okanye
maliwukhabe loo Mthetho uYilwayo.
ukuba iBhunga liyawuphumeza uMthetho oYilwayo ngaphandle kokucebisa ukuba kwenziwe utshintsho, loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawusiwe kuMongameli ukuba awuvume;

ukuba iBhunga liyawukhaba uMthetho oYilwayo okanye liyawuphumeza ngomqathango wokuba kuphunyezwe notshintsho olucetywa lilo, iNdlu mayiwuqwalasele ngokutsha loo Mthetho uYilwayo, ithabathel’ingqalelo naluphi na utshintsho olucetywa liBhunga, kwaye–
isenokuwuphumeza loo Mthetho uYilwayo kwakhona, unotshintsho okanye ungenalo; okanye
isenokugqiba kwelokuba ingaqhubeki naloo Mthetho uYilwayo.
UMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe yiNdlu ngokwesiqendu (c) mawusiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume.

content.p: Xa iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke livotela umcimbi othile ngokwesi siqendu, isiqendu 65 asisebenzi; endaweni yoko–

item.p: umthunywa ngamnye kwigqiza lephondo unevoti enye;
ubuncinane makubekho isinye kwisithathu sabathunywa ngaphambi kokuba kuvotwe ngombandela okhoyo; kwaye
umbandela lowo mawugqitywe ngesininzi seevoti, kodwa ukuba iivoti ziyalingana macala, umthunywa owongameleyo makafake ivoti yokwenz’ isigqibo.

content.p: Xa iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho iphumeza uMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (3), (4) okanye (5), loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawuthunyelwe kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke uze uqhutywe ngale ndlela ilandelayo:

item.p: iBhunga–
maliwuphumeze uMthetho oYilwayo;
maliwuphumeze loo Mthetho uYilwayo unotshintsho olwenziweyo; okanye
maliwukhabe loo Mthetho uYilwayo.
ukuba iBhunga liwuphumeza uMthetho oYilwayo ungenalutshintsho, loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawusiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;

ukuba iBhunga liwuphumeza uMthetho oYilwayo unotshintsho, loo Mthetho uYilwayo onotshintsho mawuthunyelwe kwiNdlu, kuze kuthi ukuba iNdlu iyawuphumeza loo Mthetho uYilwayo onotshintsho, usiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;

ukuba iBhunga liyawukhaba uMthetho oYilwayo, okanye ukuba iNdlu iyala ukuwuphumeza uMthetho oYilwayo onotshintsho ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendu (c), loo Mthetho uYilwayo, kwakunye noMthetho oYilwayo onotshintsho, mawuthunyelwe kwiKomiti yoLamlo, esenokuthi ivumelane–
ngaloo Mthetho uYilwayo ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo yiNdlu;
ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo liBhunga; okanye
ithi gqi nohlobo olwahlukileyo lwaloo Mthetho uYilwayo.

ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo ayikwazi ukuvumelana zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 zokuthunyelwa koMthetho oYilwayo kuyo, loo Mthetho uYilwayo uyaphelelwa ngaphandle kokuba iNdlu iyaphinda iwuphumeze kwakhona, kodwa ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo;
ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo iyavumelana ngoMthetho oYilwayo ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo yiNdlu, loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawuthunyelwe kwiBhunga, lize lithi ukuba liyawuphumeza, usiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;

ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo iyavumelana ngoMthetho oYilwayo onotshintsho ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo liBhunga, loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawuthunyelwe kwiNdlu, uze uthi ukuba uphunyeziwe yiNdlu, usiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;

ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo ivumelana ngolunye uhlobo lwaloo Mthetho uYilwayo, olo hlobo olulolunye loMthetho oYilwayo maluthunyelwe kwiNdlu nakwiBhunga, uze uthi ukuba uyaphunyezwa yiNdlu naliBhunga, usiwe kuMongameli ukuba awuvume;

ukuba uMthetho oYilwayo othunyelwe kwiBhunga ngokwesiqendu (f) okanye (h) awuphunyezwa liBhunga, loo Mthetho uyaphelelwa ngaphandle kokuba iNdlu iyawuphumeza ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo;

ukuba uMthetho oYilwayo othunyelwe kwiNdlu ngokwesiqendu (g) okanye (h) awuphunyezwa yiNdlu, loo Mthetho uYilwayo uyaphelelwa, kodwa loo Mthetho uYilwayo ngendlela owawuphunyezwe ngayo yiNdlu unokuphinda uphunyezwe yiNdlu kwakhona, kodwa ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo;
uMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe yiNdlu ngokwesiqendu (e), (i) okanye (j) mawusiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume.

content.p: Xa iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke liwuphumeza uMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (3), loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawuthunyelwe kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho uze qhutywe ngale ndlela ilandelayo:

item.p: iNdlu–
mayiwuphumeze uMthetho oYilwayo;
mayiwuphumeze loo Mthetho uYilwayo unotshintsho; okanye
mayiwukhabe loo Mthetho uYilwayo.
uMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe yiNdlu ngokwesiqendu (a)(i) mawusiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;
ukuba iNdlu iphumeza uMthetho uYilwayo onotshintsho, loo Mthetho uYilwayo onotshintsho mawuthunyelwe kwiBhunga, lize lithi iBhunga ukuba liyawuphumeza, usiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;

ukuba iNdlu iyawukhaba loo Mthetho uYilwayo, okanye ukuba iBhunga liyala ukuwuphumeza uMthetho uYilwayo onotshintsho ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendu (c), loo Mthetho uYilwayo kunye noMthetho oYilwayo onotshintsho, ukuba ukho, mawuthunyelwe kwiKomiti yoLamlo, esenokuthi ivumelane–
ngaloo Mthetho uYilwayo ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo liBhunga;
ngoMthetho oYilwayo onotshintsho ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo yiNdlu; okanye
ngolunye uhlobo lwaloo Mthetho uYilwayo.
ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo ayikwazi ukuvumelana zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 uthunyelwe kuyo loo Mthetho uYilwayo, loo Mthetho uYilwayo uyaphelelwa;
ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo iyavumelana ngaloo Mthetho uYilwayo ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo liBhunga, mawuthunyelwe kwiNdlu, kuze kuthi ukuba iNdlu iyawuphumeza, usiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;

ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo iyavumelana ngoMthetho oYilwayo onotshintsho ngendlela ophunyezwe ngayo yiNdlu, loo Mthetho uYilwayo mawuthunyelwe kwiBhunga, kuze kuthi ukuba uphunyeziwe lilo, usiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;

ukuba iKomiti yoLamlo ivumelana ngolunye uhlobo lwaloo Mthetho uYilwayo, olo hlobo lulolunye loMthetho oYilwayo maluthunyelwe kokubini kwiBhunga nakwiNdlu, uze uthi ukuba uyaphunyezwa liBhunga nayiNdlu, usiwe kuMongameli ukuze awuvume;
ukuba uMthetho oYilwayo othunyelwe kwiNdlu ngokwesiqendu (f) okanye (h) awuphunyezwa yiNdlu, loo Mthetho uYilwayo uyaphelelwa.

content.p: UMthetho oYilwayo mawuqhutywe ngokwenkqubo yesiqendwana (1) okanye yesiqendwana (2) ukuba uwela kummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4 okanye ukuba ungemibandela ekuthethwa ngayo kwesinye seziqendu ezilandelayo:

item.p: isiqendu 65(2);
isiqendu 163;
isiqendu 182;
isiqendu 195(3) nese-(4);
isiqendu 196;
nesiqendu 197.

content.p: UMthetho oYilwayo mawuqhutywe ngokwenkqubo yesiqendwana (1) ukuba ungombandela–

item.p: ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendu 44(2) okanye 220(3); okanye
ekuthethwa ngawo kwiSahluko 13, noquka nantoni na echaphazela imicimbi yeemali yoorhulumente bamaphondo.

p.remark: [Isiqendu (b) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinanye Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003.]

content.p: UMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendu 42(6) mawuqhutywe ngokwenkqubo yesiqendwana (1), umahluko nje ngowokuba–

item.p: xa iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho iwuvotela lo Mthetho uYilwayo, okutshiwo sisiqendu 53(1) akusebenzi; endaweni yoko, loo Mthetho uYilwayo unokuphunyezwa kuphela ukuba isininzi samalungu eNdlu siyawuvotela; nowokuba
ukuba loo Mthetho uYilwayo uthunyelwe kwiKomiti yoLamlo, kusebenza le migaqo ilandelayo:
ukuba iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho iqwalasela uMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendwana (1)(g) okanye (h), loo Mthetho uYilwayo unokuphunyezwa kuphela ukuba isininzi samalungu eNdlu siyawuvotela;

kuba iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho iqwalasela okanye iqwalasela ngokutsha uMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendwana (1)(e), (i) okanye (j), loo Mthetho uYilwayo unokuphunyezwa kuphela ukuba uvotelwa ubuncinane sisibini kwisithathu samalungu eNdlu.

content.p: Esi siqendu asisebenzi kwiMithetho eYilwayo yemali.
UMthetho oYilwayo unguMthetho oYilwayo wemali ukuba-

item.p: waba imali;
uhlawulisa iirhafu zezwelonke, nezinye iintlawulo;
uphelisa okanye unciphisa iirhafu, okanye ukhulula abantu ekuhlawuleni iirhafu, nezinye iintlawulo;
ugunyaza ukutsalwa kweemali ngqo kwiNgxowa-mali yeNgeniso yeLizwe, ngaphandle kokuba nguMthetho oYilwayo ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendu 214 ogunyaza ukutsalwa kwemali ngqo.

content.p: UMthetho oYilwayo wemali awuvumelekanga ukuba uthethe ngeminye imicimbi ngaphandle-

item.p: komcimbi owela ngaphantsi kowemali nonento yokwenza nokwabiwa kwemali;
kokufunwa kweerhafu, ukupheliswa kwazo okanye ukuncitshiswa kwazo, nezinye iintlawulo;
ukukhululwa kwabantu ekuhlawuleni iirhafu zezwelonke, neentlawulo ezizezinye; okanye
ukugunyazwa kokutsala ngqo kwiNgxowa-mali yeNgeniso yeLizwe.

content.p: Yonke iMithetho eYilwayo yemali mayiqwalaselwe ngokwenkqubo yesiqendu 75. UMthetho wePalamente mawuxele inkqubo yokwenz’utshintsho kwiMithetho eYilwayo yemali phambi kwePalamente.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 77 sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 2 soMthetho Wesixhenxe Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: IKomiti yoLamlo –

item.p: inamalungu alithoba eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho anyulwe yiNdlu ngokwenkqubo efunwa yimigaqo nayimiyalelo yeNdlu ethi idale ukumelwa kwamaqela kanye ngendlela elinganayo naleyo amaqela amelwe ngayo kwiNdlu; ize ibe
nomthunywa omnye ovela kwigqiza ngalinye lephondo kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, ochongwe ligqiza.

content.p: IKomiti yoLamlo sukuba ivumelene ngohlobo omawube lulo uMthetho oYilwayo, okanye sukuba isenzile isigqibo, xa olo hlobo loMthetho oYilwayo, okanye eso sigqibo isenzileyo, sixhaswa–

item.p: ubuncinane ngabahlanu kubameli beNdlu yoWiso-mthetho;
nangabahlanu ubuncinane kubameli beBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke.

content.p: UMongameli makawuvume aze awutyikitye uMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe ngokwesi Sahluko, kungenjalo, ukuba unamathandabuzo ngokuvisisana kwawo noMgaqo-siseko, makawubuyisele kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuze uqwalaselwe ngokutsha.
Imigaqo nemiyalelo yendibaniselwano mayixele inkqubo yokuqwalaselwa ngokutsha koMthetho oYilwayo yiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho nokuthabath’inxaxheba kweBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke kuloo nkqubo.
IBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke malithabath’inxaxheba ekuqwalaselweni ngokutsha koMthetho oYilwayo obuyiselwe nguMongameli kwiNdlu yoWiso- mthetho ukuba–

item.p: amathandabuzo kaMongameli ngokuvisisana koMthetho oYilwayo noMgaqo-siseko angomcimbi wenkqubo obandakanya iBhunga; okanye
isiqendu 74(1), (2) okanye (3)(b) okanye isiqendu 76 sasisebenza ekuphunyezweni kwaloo Mthetho uYilwayo.

content.p: Ukuba, emva kokuqwalaselwa kwawo ngokutsha, uMthetho oYilwayo uwaphelisa ngokupheleleyo amathandabuzo kaMongameli, uMongameli makawuvume aze awutyikitye uMthetho oYilwayo lowo; ukuba akunjalo, uMongameli-

item.p: makawuvume aze awutyikitye uMthetho oYilwayo; okanye
awuthumele kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ukuze ithathe isigqibo ngokuvisisana kwawo noMgaqo-siseko.

content.p: Ukuba iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko igqiba kwelokuba uMthetho oYilwayo lowo uyavisisana noMgaqo-siseko, uMongameli makawuvume aze awutyikitye.

section.heading: Isicelo esibhekiswa kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ngamalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho

content.p: Amalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho asenokwenz’isicelo kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko efuna umyalelo ovakalisa ukuba wonke uMthetho wePalamente okanye inxalenye yawo awuvisisani noMgaqo-siseko.
Isicelo–

item.p: masixhaswe ubuncinane sisinye kwisithathu samalungu eNdlu yoWiso- mthetho; kwaye
masenziwe zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 ukususela kumhla uMongameli awawuvuma ngawo waza wawutyikitya uMthetho lowo.

content.p: INkundla yoMgaqo-siseko isenokuyalela ukuba wonke uMthetho lowo okanye inxalenye ekwenziwa isicelo ngenxa yayo ngokwesiqendwana (1) awusebenzi okanye inxalenye yawo ayisebenzi de ibe iNkundla yenze isigqibo ngesicelo eso ukuba–

item.p: kufuneka yenze njalo ukuze kwenzeke ubulungisa; sibe
nesicelo eso kukho ithemba lokuba siza kuphumelela.
