content.p: Ukuba isicelo asiphumelelanga, kube bekungekho themba kakade lokuba siza kuphumelela, iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko isenokuyalela ukuba kube ngabenzi-sicelo abahlawula iindleko.
UMthetho oYilwayo ovunyiweyo waza watyikitywa nguMongameli uba nguMthetho wePalamente; mawupapashwe msinya, kwaye uqala ukusebenza wakuba upapashiwe okanye ngomhla ogqitywe ngokoMthetho lowo.
Ikopi etyikityiweyo yoMthetho wePalamente ibubungqina obupheleleyo bokutshiwo nguloo Mthetho; mawuthi ke, emva kokuba upapashiwe uphathiswe iNkundla yoMgaqo- siseko ukuba iwugcine.
UMongameli–

item.p: uyiNtloko yeLizwe nentloko karhulumente wezwelonke;
makawuxhase, awukhusele kwaye awuhlonele uMgaqo-siseko njengomthetho owongamileyo weRiphablikhi; kwaye
makakhuthaze ubunye belizwe kunye noko okuya kuphucula iRiphablikhi.

content.p: UMongameli unamagunya awaphathiswe nguMgaqo-siseko nayimithetho yepalamente, equka lawo ayimfuneko ukuze enze imisebenzi yokuba yiNtloko yeLizwe nentloko karhulumente wezwelonke.
UMongameli unomsebenzi–

item.p: wokuvuma iMithetho eYilwayo aze ayityikitye;
wokuphindisa emva kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho uMthetho oYilwayo ukuze uqwalaselwe ngokutsha ukuba uyavisisana kusini na noMgaqo-siseko;
wokuthumela kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko uMthetho oYilwayo ukuze yenze isigqibo ngokuvisisana kwawo noMgaqo-siseko;
wokubiza iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke okanye iPalamente eyibizela ukuba ihlale ngexesha elingelilo eliqhelekileyo ukuze yenze imisebenzi ekhethekileyo;
wokuba amisele abantu ezikhundleni ekufunwa nguMgaqo-siseko okanye ngumthetho wepalamente ukuba abamisele, engakwenzi njengentloko karhulumente wezwelonke;
wokuba amisele iikomishoni zophando;
wokuba amemelele ukuba kwenziwe uvavanyo-zimvo ngokoMthetho wePalamente;
wokuba amkele amagosa ozakuzelwano amanye amazwe kwaye abuvume ubugosa bawo;
wokuba amisele oonozakuzaku, namagosa agunyaziweyo ozakuzelwano;
wokuxolela abonileyo nokucima iifayini, izohlwayo okanye impahla ebithathwe ngokomthetho;
nowokuthi jize amawonga.

p.remark: [Qaphela: Amazwi okuwonga akuShicilelo-Mithetho LukaRhulumente 24155 lomhla wesi-6 kuDis- emba 2002 nakuShicilelo-Mithetho LukaRhulumente 25213 yomhla wama-25 kuJulayi 2003.]

content.p: Igunya loburhulumente leRiphablikhi likuMongameli.
UMongameli usebenzisa igunya loburhulumente, ekunye namanye amalungu eKhabhinethi, ngokuthi–

item.p: ayenze isebenze imithetho yepalamente yezwelonke ngaphandle kwalapho uMgaqo-siseko okanye uMthetho wePalamente utsho okwahlukileyo;
ayiphuhlise aze ayenze isebenze inkqubo yezwelonke;
alungelelanise imisebenzi yamasebe karhulumente namaziko akhe olawulo;
alungiselele aze awuqalise umthetho oza kuba ngumthetho wepalamente; nangokuthi
enze nawuphi na omnye umsebenzi woburhulumente oxeliweyo kuMgaqo- siseko okanye kwimithetho yepalamente yezwelonke.

content.p: Ekuhlaleni kwayo kokuqala emva kovoto, naxa kuyimfuneko ukuvala isithuba, iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho mayinyule umntu olibhinqa okanye oyindoda kumalungu ayo abe nguMongameli.
IJaji eyiNtloko mayongamele ekunyulweni kukaMongameli, okanye ichonge enye ijaji ukuba yenze oko. Kusebenza inkqubo echazwe kwiCandelo A leSihlomelo 3 ekunyulweni koMongameli.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 6 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Unyulo lokuvalis’isithuba kwisikhundla sokuba nguMongameli maluqhutywe ngexesha nangomhla ogqitywe yiJaji eyiNtloko, kodwa kungade kuphele iintsuku ezingama-30 sidalekile isithuba eso.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 6 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Xa umntu enyulelwe ukuba nguMongameli uyayeka ukuba lilungu leNdlu yoWiso- mthetho kwaye makuthi, zingaphelanga iintsuku ezintlanu, angene esikhundleni ngokufunga okanye ngokubhambathisa ukuthi uza kuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi aze athobele uMgaqo-siseko, ngokuvumelana neSihlomelo 2.
Ixesha lokuba sesikhundleni kukaMongameli liqala ekungeneni kwakhe esikhundleni lize liphele kusakudaleka isithuba okanye xa umntu olandelayo onyulelwe ukuba nguMongameli engena esikhundleni.

Akukho mntu uvumelekileyo ukuba sesikhundleni sokuba nguMongameli ixesha elingaphezu kwezihlandlo ezibini, kodwa xa umntu enyulelwe ukuvala isithuba sokuba nguMongameli, ithuba eliphakathi koko kunyulwa nokunyulwa okulandelayo kukaMongameli alithathwa njengesihlandlo.
INdlu yoWiso-mthetho, ngesigqibo esithathwe ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo, inokumshenxisa uMongameli esikhundleni kuphela ngezizathu zokuba:

item.p: uwaphule kakhulu uMgaqo-siseko okanye umthetho;
wenze into embi kakhulu; okanye
akakwazi ukuyenza imisebenzi yesikhundla sakhe.

content.p: Nabani na oshenxisiweyo kwisikhundla sokuba nguMongameli ngokwesiqendwana (1)(a) okanye (b) akavumelekanga ukuba afumane amaqithiqithi eso sikhundla, kwaye akavumelekanga ukuba akhonze nakusiphi na isikhundla saseburhulumenteni.

Xa uMongameli engekho kwiRiphablikhi okanye ngandlel’ithile engakwazi ukufeza imisebenzi kaMongameli, okanye xa kukho isithuba kwisikhundla sikaMongameli, umntu onesikhundla kulandelelwano olungezantsi uthi abambele njengoMongameli:

item.p: uSekela-Mongameli;
uMphathiswa ochongwe nguMongameli;
UMphathiswa ochongwe ngamanye amalungu eKhabhinethi;
uSihlalo wePalamente, de iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ichonge elinye ilungu kwamanye amalungu ayo.

content.p: UMongameli oliBambela uneembopheleleko, namagunya nemisebenzi kaMongameli.

Ngaphambi kokuba athabath’iimbopheleleko, namagunya nemisebenzi yokuba nguMongameli, uMongameli oliBambela makafunge okanye enz’isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokuvumelana neSihlomelo 2.

Umntu othe njengoMongameli oliBambela wafunga okanye wenz’isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi akukho mfuneko yokuba ayiphinde inkqubo yokufunga okanye yokwenz’isibhambathiso kwixesha elizayo lokuba nguMongameli oliBambela kwithuba lexesha eliphela xa umntu olandelayo onyulelwe ukuba nguMongameli engena esikhundleni.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (4) songezwa sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Wokuqala Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-1997.]

content.p: IKhabhinethi nguMongameli, njengentloko yeKhabhinethi, nguSekela-Mongameli naBaphathiswa.
UMongameli umisela uSekela-Mongameli naBaphathiswa, ababele amagunya abo nemisebenzi, kwaye unokubagxotha.
UMongameli–

item.p: makakhethe uSekela-Mongameli kumalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho;
unokukhetha aBaphathiswa nokuba bangaphi na kumalungu eNdlu yoWiso- mthetho; kwaye
unokukhetha aBaphathiswa abangengaphezulu kwesibini ebakhetha ngaphandle kweNdlu yoWiso-mthetho.

content.p: UMongameli makamisele ilungu leKhabhinethi ukuba libe yinkokeli yemisebenzi karhulumente kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho.
USekela-Mongameli makancedise uMongameli ekwenzeni imisebenzi karhulumente.
USekela-Mongameli naBaphathiswa banembopheleleko yokusebenzisa amagunya nokwenza imisebenzi yoburhulumente abayabelwe nguMongameli.
Amalungu eKhabhinethi aphendula kwiPalamente xa ewonke kwanomntu ngamnye ngokusebenzisa kwawo amagunya awo nangokwenza kwawo imisebenzi yawo.
Amalungu eKhabhinethi–

item.p: makenze ngokuvumelana noMgaqo-siseko; kwaye
makanike iPalamente ingxelo epheleleyo ethe rhoqo ngemicimbi ephantsi kolawulo lwawo.

content.p: UMongameli usenokumisela-

item.p: ooSekela-Mphathiswa nokuba bangaphi na ebakhetha kumalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho; kwaye
ooSekela-Mphathiswa abangekho ngaphezu kwesibini abakhethe ngaphandle kweNdlu, ukuze bancedise amalungu eKhabhinethi, kwaye unokubagxotha.

content.p: OoSekela-Mphathiswa abamiselwe ngokwesiqendwana (1)(b) baphendula kwiPalamente ngokusebenzisa kwabo amagunya abo nangokwenza kwabo imisebenzi yabo.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 93 sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 7 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Xa kuthi kubekho unyulo lweNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, iKhabhinethi, uSekela-Mongameli, aBaphathiswa kunye nooSekela-Mphathiswa baqhubeka benalo igunya lokusebenza de umntu onyulelwe ukuba nguMongameli yiNdlu elandelayo angene esikhundleni.

Ngaphambi kokuba uSekela-Mongameli, aBaphathiswa kunye nooSekela-Mphathiswa baqalise ukwenza imisebenzi, mabafunge okanye benz’isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokuvumelana neSihlomelo 2.
Amalungu eKhabhinethi nooSekela-Mphathiswa mabaziphathe ngokwemigqaliselo yokuziphatha etshiwo yimithetho yepalamente yezwelonke.
Amalungu eKhabhinethi nooSekela-Mphathiswa abavumelekanga ukuba–

item.p: benze nawuphi na omnye umsebenzi ohlawulelwayo;
benze ngendlela engavisisaniyo nesikhundla abakuso, okanye bazibeke kwimeko esenokwenza kubekho ungquzulwano phakathi kweembopheleleko zabo zaseburhulumenteni nemicimbi yabo yangasese; okanye
basebenzise isikhundla sabo okanye ingcombolo abayiphathisiweyo, beyisebenzisela ukuzityebisa okanye ukuzuzisa omnye umntu ngendlela engafanelekanga.

content.p: UMongameli unokuthi ngokwenza isihlokomiso afudusele kwilungu leKhabhinethi–

item.p: ukusingathwa komthetho wepalamente okuphathiswe elinye ilungu; okanye
naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi ophathiswe elinye ilungu ngokomthetho wepalamente.

content.p: UMongameli unokuphathisa ilungu leKhabhinethi naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi ongowelinye ilungu leKhabhinethi elingekhoyo emsebenzini okanye elingakwaziyo ukusebenzisa elo gunya okanye ukwenza loo msebenzi.

Ilungu leKhabhinethi lisenokuphathisa naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi ekuligunya emalisetyenziswe okanye ekungumsebenzi omawenziwe ngokoMthetho wePalamente, liwuphathise uMphathiswa wephondo okanye iBhunga likaMasipala. Ukuphathisa oko–

item.p: makube ngokwesivumelwano phakathi kwelo lungu leKhabhinethi noMphathiswa wephondo okanye iBhunga likaMasipala;
makuvisisane noMthetho wePalamente elisetyenziswa ngokwaloo Mthetho igunya elo, okanye owenziwa ngokwaloo Mthetho umsebenzi lowo; kwaye
kuqalisa ukusebenza kusakuhlokonyiswa nguMongameli.

p.remark: [Lo mxholwana wenziwa utshintsho sisiqendu 2(a) soMthetho Weshumi Elinanye Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003.]

content.p: Xa iphondo lingakwazi ukuyifeza okanye lingayifezi imbopheleleko yoburhulumente engokoMgaqo-siseko okanye engokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke, urhulumente wezwelonke usenokungenelela ngokuthabatha nawaphi na amanyathelo afanelekileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba iyafezekiswa loo mbopheleleko, kuquka–

item.p: ukukhupha umyalelo uye kwisigqeba sephondo esinolawulo oluphezulu, nokukhupha umyalelo oya kurhulumente wephondo, ochaza ubungakanani bokusilela ukufezekisa iimbopheleleko zakhe, kwaye uchaza namanyathelo afunekayo ukuze kufezekiswe iimbopheleleko zakhe;
nokuyithathela kuye imbopheleleko kwelo phondo ngokwendlela efunekayo ukuze–
kuhlale kukho imilinganiselo eyimfuneko yezwelonke okanye kubekho imilinganiselo eyeyona iphantsi yokuba kwenziwe oko kufuneka kwenziwe;
kuhlale kukho ubunye kuqoqosho;
kuhlale kukho ukhuseleko lwezwelonke; okanye
kuthintelwe elo phondo ekuthatheni inyathelo elingabhadlanga elinobungozi kwelinye iphondo okanye elizweni lonke.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) senziwa utshintsho sisiqendu 2(b) soMthetho Weshumi Elinanye Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003.]

content.p: Ukuba urhulumente wezwelonke uyangenelela kwiphondo ngokwesiqendwana (1) (b)–

item.p: makanike iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke isaziso esibhaliweyo sokungenelela kwakhe zingaphelanga iintsuku ezili-14 luqalileungenelelo;
ungenelelo maluphele ukuba iBhunga liyaluchasa ungenelelo kwisithuba seentsuku ezili-180 luqalile, okanye ukuba liphela elo thuba lexesha lungadanga luvunywe ungenelelo; kananjalo
ngoxa luqhubeka ungenelelo, iBhunga maliman’ukuluqwalasela ngokutsha ungenelelo kwaye lisenokwenza naziphi na iziphakamiso ezifanelekileyo kurhulumente wezwelonke.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 2(c) soMthetho Weshumi Elinanye Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003.]

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke usenokuyilawula inkqubo emiselwe sesi siqendu.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 100 senziwa utshintsho sisiqendu 2 soMthetho Weshumi Elinanye Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003.]

content.p: Isigqibo esenziwe nguMongameli masibhalwe phantsi ukuba–

item.p: senziwe ngokomthetho wepalamente; okanye
sineziphumo ezibandakany’umthetho.

content.p: Isigqibo esibhaliweyo esenziwe nguMongameli masityikitywe nalelinye ilungu leKhabhinethi ukuba eso sigqibo sichaphazela umsebenzi owabelwe elo lungu leKhabhinethi.
Izihlokomiso, imimiselo nokunye okuyimithethwana, malukwazi ukukufumana uluntu.
Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke usenokuxela indlela, nokuthi kangakanani, emayithi imithethwana ekhankanywe kwisiqendwana (3)–

item.p: ithiwe thaca ePalamente; ize
ivunywe yiPalamente.

content.p: Ukuba iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, ngevoti exhaswa sisininzi samalungu ayo, iphumeza isindululo sokungabi sayithemba iKhabhinethi, ingaquki noMongameli, uMongameli makayitshintshe iKhabhinethi.

Ukuba iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, ngevoti exhaswa sisininzi samalungu ayo, iphumeza isindululo sokungabi samthemba uMongameli, uMongameli namanye amalungu eKhabhinethi kunye nooSekela-Mphathiswa mabaphume ezikhundleni.
IRiphablikhi inamaphondo alandelayo:

item.p: iMpuma-Koloni;
iFreyistata;
iRhawuti;
KwaZulu-Natal;
iLimpopo;
iMpumalanga;
uMntla-Koloni;
uMntla-Ntshona;
iNtshona-Koloni.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 3 soMthetho Weshumi Elinanye Wokwenz’Ut- shintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003, saza sona sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesibini Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqos-siseko ka-2005.]

content.p: Imimandla yamaphondo iyiyo yonke imimandla eboniswe kwiimaphu ngeemaphu ekuthethwe ngazo kwiSaziso esidweliswe kwiSihlomelo 1A.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesibini Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2005.]

item.p: Nanini na xa ummandla wephondo utshintshwa lutshintsho olwenziwa kuMgaqo-siseko, uMthetho wePalamente usenokuxela iindlela, kungadanga kube lixesha elide, zokulawula iziphumo ezibandakany’umthetho nezinye iziphumo ezizezinye ezizalwa lolo tshintsho.

UMthetho wePalamente ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendu (a) usenokuwiswa uze wenziwe usebenze ngaphambi kokuba luqalise ukusebenza olo tshintsho loMgaqo-siseko, kodwa imisebenzi yephondo, impahla yephondo, namalungelo, neembopheleleko, nemisebenzi, zinokufuduswa kuphela ngokwaloo Mthetho emva kokuba luqalile ukusebenza olo tshintsho loMgaqo-siseko.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 103 sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesibini Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2005.]

content.p: Igunya lokuwis’umthetho lephondo likwindlu yowiso yowiso-mthetho yalo kwaye lithi jize kwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo igunya–

item.p: lokuphumeza umgaqo-siseko wephondo okanye lokwenz’utshintsho kumgaqo-siseko ophunyezwe yiyo ngokwesiqendu 142 nese-143;
lokuphumeza umthetho wephondo ngawo–
nawuphi na umcimbi owela kummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo (4);
nawuphi na umcimbi owela kummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 5;
nawuphi na umcimbi owela ngaphandle kuloo mimandla yentsebenzo, kodwa ube usabelwa iphondo ngokucacileyo ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke;
nangawo nawuphi na umcimbi okuthi okutshiwo nguMgaqo-siseko kuvul’indlela yokuwiswa komthetho wephondo;
nelokuba amagunya alo okuwis’umthetho liwaphathise iBhunga likaMasipala kwelo phondo.

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, ngesindululo esamkelwe ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo, isenokucela iPalamente ukuba iliguqule igama lelo phondo.

Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo inkqanyangelwa kuphela nguMgaqo-siseko ize, ukuba iphumeze umgaqo-siseko wephondo, inkqanyangelwe nanguloo mgaqo- siseko, kwaye mayenze ngokuvumelana noMgaqo-siseko nangokuvumelana nomgaqo-siseko wephondo nangokulawulwa yimida yawo.

Umthetho wepalamente yephondo omayela nomcimbi oyimfuneko ukuze lisetyenziswe ngempumelelo igunya ngawo nawuphi na umcimbi odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4, ungumthetho wepalamente ongomcimbi odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4.

Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo isenokucela iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho ukuba yamkele umthetho wepalamente ongomcimbi ongaphaya kwegunya laloo ndlu yowiso-mthetho okanye ongomcimbi ekuthi kuwo kukhonye uMthetho wePalamente kunomthetho wephondo.

section.heading: Indlela ezakheke ngayo izindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo nonyulo lwazo

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ngamabhinqa namadoda anyulwe njengamalungu ngokwenkqubo yonyulo–

item.p: efunwa ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke;
esekelwe kwinxalenye yelo phondo yomqulu wabavoti wezwelonke;
ethi eyona minyaka iphantsi yobudala anokuvota kuyo umntu yiminyaka eli-18;
nesiphumo sayo sikukumelwa ngokulinganayo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) senziwa utshintsho sisiqendu 3 soMthetho Weshumi Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003 nasisiqendu 3 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesine Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo inamalungu aphakathi kwama-30 nama-80. Inani lamalungu, elisenokushiya-shiyana ngokwamaphondo, maligqitywe ngokwendlela efunwa ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Wonke ummi ofanelekayo ukuba avotele iNdlu yoWiso-mthetho uyafaneleka ukuba abe lilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, ngaphandle–

item.p: komntu oqeshwe ngurhulumente, okanye osebenzela urhulumente, kwaye efumana umvuzo ngoko kuqeshwa okanye ngoko kumsebenzela–
engeyiyo iNkulumbuso nabanye aBaphathiswa bephondo;

kungengabo nabanye abasezikhundleni abamisebenzi yabo ihambelanayo nemisebenzi yelungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, kwaye ibe loo misebenzi ivakaliswe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ihambelana nemisebenzi yelungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo;
kwabangengawo amalungu eNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, abathunywa abasisigxina kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke okanye amalungu eBhunga likaMasipala;
kwabangengabo abavakaliswe yinkundla bengakwazi ukuwahlawula amatyala abo kwaye bengekaphumi kuloo meko;
kongenguye ovakaliswe yinkundla yeRiphablikhi engongaphilanga engqondweni; okanye

kongenguye othe, emva kokuba esi siqendu siqalise ukusebenza, wafunyaniswa enetyala lokwaphul’umthetho waza wagwetywa ixesha elingaphezu kweenyanga ezili-12 entolongweni engakhethiswanga fayini, nokuba kulapha kwiRiphablikhi okanye kungaphandle kweRiphablikhi, ukuba isenzo ukuba esikukwaphul’umthetho besiya kuba kukwaphul’umthetho kwiRiphablikhi, kodwa akukho mntu onokuthathwa njengogwetyiweyo de kube kwenziwe isigqibo ngesibheno sakhe nxamnye nokufunyaniswa kwakhe enetyala okanye nxamnye nesigwebo sakhe, okanye de libe ixesha lokubhena liphelile. Ukungafaneleki okutshiwo sesi siqendu kuphela emva kweminyaka emihlanu sigqityiwe isigwebo.

content.p: Umntu ongafanelekiyo ukuba lilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ngokwesiqendwana (1)(a) okanye (b) unokuzigqatsela ukuba kwindlu yowiso- mthetho, kodwa ke ngokulawulwa yimida okanye yimiqathango ebekwe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Umntu uyalahlekelwa bubulngu bendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ukuba–

item.p: uyayeka ukuba ngofanelekayo; okanye
uthi angabikho kwindlu yowiso-mthetho ngaphandle kwemnvume kwiimeko ethi imigaqo nemiyalelo yendlu yowiso-mthetho iyalele ukuba makalahlekelwe bubulungu; okanye
uyayeka ukuba lilungu lombutho owamchongayo ukuba abe lilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 4 soMthetho Weshumi Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003 nasisiqendu 4 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesine Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Zithuba kwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo mazivalwe ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

Ngaphambi kokuba amalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo aqalise ukwenza imisebenzi yawo kwindlu yowiso-mthetho, makafunge okanye enze isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokweSihlomelo 2.
Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo inyulelwa ixesha eliyiminyaka emihlanu.

Ukuba indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ithi ichithwe ngokwesiqendu 109, okanye xa kuphela ixesha layo, iNkulumbuso mayithi, ngokwenza isihlokomiso, imemelele ukuba kubekho unyulo ize ixele imihla yalo, lunyulo olo omalubekho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90 ukususela kumhla eyachithwa ngawo indlu yowiso-mthetho okanye ukususela kumhla wokuphela kwexesha layo.

p.remark: [Isihlokomiso esimemelela unyulo nesixela imihla yalo sinokukhutshwa ngaphambi kokuphela kwexesha lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo okanye emva kokuphela kwalo.]
[Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Wesine Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-1999.]

content.p: Ukuba isiphumo sendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo asibhengezwa lo gama kuselixesha elimiselwe ngokwesiqendu 190, okanye ukuba unyulo luthi luphuthiswe yinkundla, uMongameli makathi, ngokwenza isihlokomiso, amemelele olunye unyulo aze axele imihla yalo, lunyulo olo omalubekho zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90 ukususela ekupheleni kwelo xesha okanye ukususela kumhla olwathi unyulo lwaphuthiswa ngawo.

Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo iqhubeka inako ukusebenza ukususela kwixesha echithwa ngalo okanye ukususela kwixesha lokuphelelwa kwayo, kude kube yimini eyandulela usuku lokuqala lokuvotela indlu yowiso-mthetho elandelayo.

section.heading: Ukuchithwa kwezindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo ngaphambi kokuphela kwexesha lazo

content.p: Inkulumbuso yephondo mayiyichithe indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ukuba–

item.p: indlu yowiso-mthetho yamkele isigqibo sokuyichitha ngevoti exhasayo yesininzi samalungu ayo; naxa
kudlule iminyaka emithathu ukususela ekunyulweni kwendlu yowiso- mthetho.

content.p: INkulumbuso eBambeleyo mayiyichithe indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ukuba–

item.p: kukho isithuba kwisikhundla seNkulumbuso; naxa
indlu yowiso-mthetho ingayinyulanga iNkulumbuso entsha kwisithuba seentsuku ezingama-30 sidalekile isithuba eso.

content.p: Emva konyulo, ukuhlala kokuqala kwendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo makube ngexesha nangomhla ogqitywe yijaji echongwe yiJaji eyiNtloko, kodwa zingade ziphele iintsuku ezili-14 sibhengeziwe isiphumo sonyulo. Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo inokuzenzela isigqibo ngexesha nangobude lokunye ukuhlala kwayo nangamaxesha ayo ekhefu.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 8 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Inkulumbuso yephondo inokuthi nangaliphi na ixesha ibize indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ukuba ihlale ngexesha elingelilo lokuhlala ukuze yenze imisebenzi ekhethekileyo.
Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo isenokwenz’isigqibo mayela nokuba iza kuhlala phi ngokuqhelekileyo.
Ekuhlaleni kwayo kokuqala emva konyulo, okanye xa kuyimfuneko ukuvala isithuba, indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo mayinyule uSihlalo noSekela-Sihlalo kumalungu ayo.
Ijaji echongwe yiJaji eyiNtloko mayongamele ukunyulwa kukaSihlalo. USihlalo yena wongamela ukunyulwa kukaSekela-Sihlalo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 9 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Inkqubo echazwe kwiCandelo A leSihlomelo 3 iyasebenza ekunyulweni kooSihlalo nooSekela-Sihlalo.
Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo inokumshenxisa esikhundleni uSihlalo wayo okanye uSekela-Sihlalo wayo ngokuthath’isigqibo. Makubekho isininzi samalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho xa kusamkelwa eso sigqibo.
Ngokwemigaqo yayo nemiyalelo, indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo isenokunyula kumalungu ayo amanye amagosa okongamela ukuba ancedise uSihlalo noSekela- Sihlalo.
Ngaphandle kwaxa uMgaqo-siseko utsho okwahlukileyo–

item.p: makubekho isininzi samalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ngaphambi kokuba kuvotelwe uMthetho oYilwayo okanye uMthetho oYilwayo wokwenz’ utshintsho;
makubekho ubuncinane isinye kwisithathu samalungu ngaphambi kokuba kuvotelwe nawuphi na omnye umbandela ophambi kwendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo; kananjalo
onke imibandela ephambi kwendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo igqitywa ngesininzi seevoti.

content.p: Ilungu elongameleyo kwintlanganiso yendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo alinakuthabath’inxaxheba kwiingxoxo, kodwa–

item.p: malivote kwivoti yokwenz’isigqibo xa iivoti zilingana macala kumbandela okhoyo; kwaye
linokuthabath’inxaxheba kwiingxoxo xa umbandela oxoxwayo kufuneka ugqitywe ngevoti yesibini kwisithathu ubuncinane samalungu endlu yowiso- mthetho.

section.heading: Amalungelo abathunywa abasisigxina kwizindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo

content.p: Abathunywa abasisigxina bephondo kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke bavumelekile ukuba babekho, kwaye bavumelekile ukuba bathethe, kwizindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo abo nakwiikomiti zazo, kodwa abavumelekanga ukuba bavote. Indlu yowiso-mthetho isenokufuna ukuba umthunywa osisigxina abekho kwindlu yowiso- mthetho okanye kwiikomiti zayo.
Ekusebenziseni igunya layo lokuwis’imithetho, indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo-

item.p: inokuqwalasela nawuphi na uMthetho oYilwayo ophambi kwendlu yowiso- mthetho, iwuphumeze, yenze utshintsho kuwo okanye iwukhabe, kwaye
inokuwuqalisa ngokwayo umthetho okanye iwulungiselele, ngaphandle kweMithetho eYilwayo yemali.

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo mayithi gqi namacebo–

item.p: okuqinisekisa ukuba onke amacandelo karhulumente akwiphondo ayaphendula kuyo;
nawokuba liliso–
ekusetyenzisweni kwegunya lokulawula kwiphondo, kuquka nokwenziwa kwemithetho isebenze;
nakulo naliphi na icandelo likarhulumente kwiphondo.

section.heading: Ubungqina okanye ingcombolo phambi kwezindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo okanye nayiphi na ikomiti kwiikomiti zayo–

item.p: inokubiza nawuphi na umntu ukuba avele phambi kwayo ukuze anike ubungqina efungile okanye enze isibhambathiso sokutheth’inyaniso, okanye avelise amaxwebhu;
isenokufuna ukuba nawuphi na umntu okanye iziko lenze ingxelo kuyo;
isenokunyanzela nawuphi na umntu okanye umbutho ngokomthetho wephondo okanye ngokwemigaqo nemiyalelo, ukuba athobele umsila wengwe okanye enze okufunwayo ngokwesiqendu (a) okanye (b); kwaye
isenokwamkela izicelo okanye okuvela nakuwuphi na umntu ochaphazelekayo okanye imibutho echaphazelekayo.

section.heading: Amalungiselelo angaphakathi neenkqubo zezindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo-

item.p: inokwenza izigqibo ngamalungiselelo nangeenkqubo zayo ize izilawule; kananjalo
inokwenza imigaqo nemiyalelo ngemicimbi yayo, ikwenza oko ikhumbula intando yesininzi yokumelwa kwabantu nokuthabath’inxaxheba kwabo, ukuphendula, ukusebenzela elubala, nokubandakanyeka koluntu.

content.p: Imigaqo nemiyalelo yendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo mayixele–

item.p: ukuba zisekwa njani, zakhiwe njani, iikomiti zayo, ayintoni amagunya azo, nemisebenzi yazo, neenkqubo zazo nobude bexesha lobukho bazo;
ukuthabath’inxaxheba kwamaqela amancinane amelweyo kwindlu yowiso-mthetho, ethabath’inxaxheba kwiinkqubo zendlu yowiso-mthetho nakwiikomiti zayo, ngendlela evisisana nentando yesininzi;
uncedo lwemali nololawulo kwiqela ngalinye elimelweyo kwindlu yowiso- mthetho ngokulingana nokumelwa kwalo, ukuze iqela elo nenkokeli yalo liyenze imisebenzi yalo kwindlu yowiso-mthetho ngempumelelo;
nokwamkelwa kwenkokeli yelona qela likhulu liphikisayo kwindlu yowiso- mthetho njengeNkokeli yeQela Eliphikisayo.

content.p: Amalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo nabathunywa abasisigxina bephondo kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke-

item.p: banenkululeko yokuthetha kwindlu yowiso-mthetho nakwiikomiti zayo, kodwa ke ngokulawulwa yimigaqo nayimiyalelo; kwaye
abanakumangalelwa ngetyala lembambano okanye lolwaphulo-mthetho, babanjwe, bavalelwe entolongweni okanye bafunw’imbuyekezo ngomonakalo odalwe–
yiyo nayiphi na into abayithethileyo kwindlu yowiso-mthetho okanye bayivelisa phambi kwayo okanye kwiikomiti zayo; okanye
yiyo nayiphi na into ethe yatyhileka ngenxa yento abayithethileyo kwindlu yowiso-mthetho okanye bayivelisa phambi kwayo okanye kwiikomiti zayo.

content.p: Ezinye izinto ezingenakubekwa tyala ngazo izindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo namalungu azo zinokutshiwo ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Imivuzo, iimalana ezisecaleni namaqithiqithi ahlawulwa amalungu endlu yowiso- mthetho yephondo ziimali ezitsalwa ngqo kwiNgxowa-mali yeNgeniso yePhondo.

section.heading: Ukungena koluntu kwizindlu zowiso-mthetho zamaphondo nokubandakanyeka kwalo

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo–

item.p: mayenze ukuba uluntu lubandakanyeke kwiinkqubo zowiso-mthetho nakwezinye iinkqubo zendlu yowiso-mthetho nezeekomiti zazo; kwaye
mayiwenze umsebenzi wayo elubala, iintlanganiso zayo, nezeekomiti zayo, zibe selubala, kodwa ke kusenokuthatyathwa amanyathelo afanelekileyo–
okukulawula ukungena koluntu, kuquka nokungena kwamajelo eendaba, kwindlu yowiso-mthetho neekomiti zayo; nawokuba
asetshwe umntu kwaye, xa kufanelekile, alelwe ukuba angene okanye akhutshwe.

content.p: Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo ayivumelekanga ukuba ilwalele uluntu, kuquka namajelo eendaba, ukungena kwintlanganiso yekomiti, ngaphandle kokuba kufanelekile kwaye kuyathetheleleka ukwenza njalo kuluntu olukhululekileyo lwentando yesininzi.

NgaBaphathiswa bephondo okanye ikomiti okanye ilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo abanokuthi bangenise uMthetho oYilwayo kwindlu yowiso-mthetho; kodwa kuphela nguMphathiswa ophathiswe imicimbi yeemali kwiphondo onokuthi angenise uMthetho oYilwayo wemali kwindlu yowiso-mthetho.
UMthetho oYilwayo unguMthetho oYilwayo wemali ukuba-

item.p: waba imali;
uhlawulisa iirhafu zephondo, nezinye iintlawulo;
uphelisa okanye unciphisa iirhafu, okanye ukhulula abantu ekuhlawuleni iirhafu, nezinye iintlawulo;
ugunyaza ukutsalwa kweemali ngqo kwiNgxowa-mali yeNgeniso yePhondo.

content.p: UMthetho oYilwayo wemali awuvumelekanga ukuba uthethe ngeminye imicimbi ngaphandle–

item.p: komcimbi owela ngaphantsi kowemali nonento yokwenza nokwabiwa kwemali;
kokufunwa kweerhafu, ukupheliswa kwazo okanye ukuncitshiswa kwazo, nezinye iintlawulo;
ngokukhululwa kwabantu ekuhlawuleni iirhafu zephondo, neentlawulo ezizezinye; okanye
ngokugunyazwa kokutsala ngqo kwiNgxowa-mali yeNgeniso yePhondo.

content.p: UMthetho wephondo mawuxele inkqubo enokuthi ngayo indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo yenz’utshintsho kuMthetho oYilwayo wemali.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 120 sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 3 soMthetho Wesixhenxe Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko.]

content.p: INkulumbuso yephondo mayiwuvume ize iwutyikitye uMthetho oYilwayo ophunyezwe ngokwesi Sahluko, kungenjalo, ukuba inamathandabuzo ngokuvisisana kwawo noMgaqo-siseko, mayiwubuyisele kwindlu yowiso-mthetho ukuze uqwalaselwe ngokutsha.

Ukuba, emva kokuqwalaselwa kwawo ngokutsha, uMthetho oYilwayo uwaphelisa ngokupheleleyo amathandabuzo eNkulumbuso, iNkulumbuso mayiwuvume ize iwutyikitye uMthetho oYilwayo lowo; ukuba akunjalo, iNkulumbuso-

item.p: mayiwuvume ize iwutyikitye uMthetho oYilwayo; okanye
iwuthumele kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ukuze ithathe isigqibo ngokuvisisana kwawo noMgaqo-siseko.

content.p: Ukuba iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko igqiba kwelokuba uMthetho oYilwayo lowo uyavisisana noMgaqo-siseko, iNkulumbuso mayiwuvume ize iwutyikitye.
Amalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo asenokwenz’isicelo kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko efuna umyalelo ovakalisa ukuba wonke uMthetho wephondo okanye inxalenye yawo awuvisisani noMgaqo-siseko.
Isicelo–

item.p: masixhaswe ubuncinane ngamashumi amabini ekhulwini kumalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho; kwaye
masenziwe zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 ukususela kumhla iNkulumbuso eyawuvuma ngawo yaza yawutyikitya uMthetho lowo.

content.p: INkundla yoMgaqo-siseko isenokuyalela ukuba wonke uMthetho lowo okanye inxalenye ekwenziwa isicelo ngenxa yayo ngokwesiqendwana (1) awusebenzi okanye inxalenye yawo ayisebenzi de ibe iNkundla yenze isigqibo ngesicelo eso ukuba–

item.p: kufuneka yenze njalo ukuze kwenzeke ubulungisa; sibe
nesicelo eso kukho ithemba lokuba siza kuphumelela.

content.p: Ukuba isicelo asiphumelelanga, kube kungekho themba kakade lokuba siza kuphumelela, iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko isenokuyalela ukuba kube ngabenzi-sicelo abahlawula iindleko.
UMthetho oYilwayo ovunyiweyo waza watyikitywa yiNkulumbuso uba nguMthetho wephondo; mawupapashwe msinya, kwaye uqala ukusebenza wakuba upapashiwe okanye ngomhla ogqitywe ngokoMthetho lowo.
UMthetho oYilwayo ovunyiweyo waza watyikitywa yiNkulumbuso yephondo uba nguMthetho wephondo; mawuthi ke, emva kokuba upapashiwe, uphathiswe iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ukuba iwugcine.
Igunya loburhulumente lephondo likwiNkulumbuso yelo phondo.
INkulumbuso isebenzisa igunya loburhulumente, ikunye nabanye aBaphathiswa bephondo, ngokuthi –

item.p: iyenze isebenze imithetho yendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo kwiphondo;
iyenze isebenze yonke imithetho yepalamente yezwelonke ewela kwimimandla yentsebenzo ekwiSihlomleo 4 okanye 5 ngaphandle kwalapho uMgaqo-siseko okanye uMthetho wePalamente utsho okwahlukileyo;

yenze kusebenze kwiphondo imithetho yepalamente yezwelonke ewela ngaphandle kwemimandla yentsebenzo edweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4 nesesi-5, ekusetyenziswa kwayo kwabelwe urhulumente wephondo ngokoMthetho wePalamente;
iyiphuhlise ize iyenze isebenze inkqubo yephondo;
ilungelelanise imisebenzi yamaziko amaphondo neyamasebe awo;
ilungiselele ize iwuqalise ngokwayo umthetho wepalamente wephondo;
yenze nawuphi na omnye umsebenzi owabelwe urhulumente wephondo ngokoMgaqo-siseko okanye ngokoMthetho wePalamente.

content.p: Iphondo linegunya loburhulumente ngokwesiqendwana (2)(b) kuphela ngokulawulwa kukukwazi kwephondo ukusebenza ngempumelelo. Urhulumente wezwelonke, ngokuwis’umthetho nangezinye iindlela, makancedise amaphondo ukuba aphuhlise ukukwazi kwawo ukuwasebenzisa ngempumelelo amagunya awo nokwenza kwawo imisebenzi ekuthethwe ngayo kwisiqendwana (2).

Nayiphi na imbambano engokukwazi kwephondo ukwenza nawuphi na umsebenzi mayibhekiswe kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke ukuze isonjululwe lilo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 ukususela kumhla wokubhekiswa kwayo kwiBhunga.
Ngokulawulwa sisiqendu 100, ukusetyenziswa kwemithetho yephondo kwiphondo ligunya elinokusetyenziswa ngurhulumente wephondo kuphela.
Urhulumente wephondo makenze ngokuvumelana–

item.p: noMgaqo-siseko; kwakunye
nomgaqo-siseko wephondo, ukuba kuphunyezwe umgaqo-siseko wephondo.

content.p: UMphathiswa wephondo unokuphathisa naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi ekuligunya emalisetyenziswe okanye ekungumsebenzi omawenziwe ngokoMthetho wephondo, ewuphathisa iBhunga likaMasipala. Ukuphathisa oko–

item.p: makube ngokwesivumelwano phakathi koMphathiswa wephondo lowo neBhunga likaMasipala;
makuvisisane noMthetho ekusekelwe kuwo igunya elisetyenziswayo okanye ekusekelwe kuwo umsebenzi owenziwayo; kwaye
kuqala ukusebenza kusakuhlokonyiswa yiNkulumbuso.

content.p: INkulumbuso yephondo inamagunya nemisebenzi ephathiswe umntu okweso sikhundla nguMgaqo-siseko nanguwo nawuphi na umthetho wepalamente.
INkulumbuso yephondo inomsebenzi–

item.p: wokuvuma iMithetho eYilwayo ize iyityikitye;
wokuphindisa emva kwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo uMthetho oYilwayo ukuze uqwalaselwe ngokutsha ukuba uyavisisana kusini na noMgaqo-siseko;
wokuthumela kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko uMthetho oYilwayo ukuze yenze isigqibo ngokuvisisana kwawo noMgaqo-siseko;
wokubiza indlu yowiso-mthetho eyibizela ukuba ihlale ngexesha elingelilo eliqhelekileyo ukuze yenze imisebenzi ekhethekileyo;
wokuba imisele iikomishoni zophando;
nowokuthi makubekho uvavanyo-zimvo kwiphondo ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

content.p: Ekuhlaleni kwayo kokuqala emva kovoto, naxa kuyimfuneko ukuvala isithuba, indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo mayinyule umntu olibhinqa okanye oyindoda kumalungu ayo abe yiNkulumbuso yelo phondo.
Ijaji echongwe yiJaji eyiNtloko mayongamele ekunyulweni kweNkulumbuso, okanye ichonge enye ijaji ukuba yenze oko. Kusebenza inkqubo ekwiCandelo A leSihlomelo 3 ekunyulweni kweNkulumbuso.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 10 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshint- sho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Unyulo lokuvala isikhewu sokuba yiNkulumbuso malube ngexesha eligqitywe nangomhla ogqitywe yiJaji eyiNtloko, kodwa makungade kuphele iintsuku ezingama-30 sidalekile isithuba eso.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 10 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshint- sho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Umntu onyulelwe ukuba yiNkulumbuso makangene esikhundleni zingaphelanga iintsuku ezintlanu enyuliwe, ngokuthi afunge okanye enz’isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokweSihlomelo 2.

Ixesha lokuba sesikhundleni kweNkulumbuso liqala xa iNkulumbuso leyo ingena esikhundleni lize liphele kusakudaleka isithuba okanye xa umntu olandelayo onyulelwe ukuba yiNkulumbuso engena esikhundleni.

Akukho mntu uvumelekileyo ukuba sesikhundleni sokuba yiNkulumbuso ixesha elingaphezu kwezihlandlo ezibini, kodwa xa umntu enyulelwe ukuvala isithuba sokuba yiNkulumbuso, ithuba eliphakathi koko kunyulwa nokunyulwa okulandelayo kweNkulumbuso alithathwa njengesihlandlo.
Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, ngesigqibo esithathwe ngevoti exhasayo ubuncinane yesibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo, inokuyishenxisa iNkulumbuso esikhundleni kuphela ngezizathu zokuba–

item.p: iwaphule kakhulu uMgaqo-siseko okanye umthetho;
yenze into embi kakhulu; okanye
ayikwazi ukuyenza imisebenzi yesikhundla sayo.

content.p: Nabani na oshenxisiweyo kwisikhundla sokuba yiNkulumbuso ngokwesiqendwana (3)(a) okanye (b) akavumelekanga ukuba afumane amaqithiqithi eso sikhundla, kwaye akavumelekanga ukuba akhonze nakusiphi na isikhundla saseburhulumenteni.

Xa iNkulumbuso ingekho okanye ngandlel’ithile ingakwazi ukufeza imisebenzi yeNkulumbuso, okanye xa kukho isithuba kwisikhundla seNkulumbuso, umntu onesikhundla kulandelelwano olungezantsi uthi abambele njengeNkulumbuso:

item.p: uMphathiswa wephondo ochongwe yiNkulumbuso;
uMphathiswa wephondo ochongwe ngabanye aBaphathiswa bephondo;
USihlalo wendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, de indlu yowiso-mthetho ichonge elinye ilungu kwamanye amalungu ayo.

content.p: INkulumbuso eliBambela ineembopheleleko, namagunya nemisebenzi yeNkulumbuso.

Ngaphambi kokuba ithabath’iimbopheleleko, namagunya nemisebenzi yokuba yiNkulumbuso, iNkulumbuso eliBambela mayifunge okanye yenz’isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokuvumelana neSihlomelo 2.

ABaphathiswa bephondo yiNkulumbuso, njengeNtloko yaBaphathiswa bephondo, kunye namalungu angekho ngaphantsi kwesihlanu kodwa angekho ngaphezu kweshumi amiselwe yiNkulumbuso ithatha kumalungu endlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo.
INkulumbuso yephondo imisela aBaphathiswa bephondo, ibabele amagunya abo nemisebenzi yabo, kwaye inokubagxotha.
ABaphathiswa bephondo banembopheleleko yokwenza imisebenzi karhulumente abayabelwe yiNkulumbuso.
ABaphathiswa bephondo baphendula kwindlu yowiso-mthetho xa bebonke kwanomntu ngamnye ngokusebenzisa kwabo amagunya abo nangokwenza kwabo imisebenzi yabo.
ABaphathiswa bephondo–

item.p: mabenze ngokuvumelana noMgaqo-siseko, kananjalo ukuba kuphunyezwe umgaqo-siseko wephondo, benze nangokuvumelana naloo mgaqo-siseko; kwaye
mabanike indlu yowiso-mthetho ingxelo epheleleyo ethe rhoqo ngemicimbi ephantsi kolawulo lwabo.

content.p: Xa kuthi kubekho unyulo lwendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, aBaphathiswa bamaphondo baqhubeka benalo igunya lokusebenza de umntu onyulelwe ukuba yiNkulumbuso yindlu yowiso-mthetho elandelayo angene esikhundleni.
Ngaphambi kokuba aBaphathiswa bephondo baqalise ukwenza imisebenzi yabo, mabafunge okanye benz’isibhambathiso sokuthembeka kwiRiphablikhi nokuthobela uMgaqo-siseko, ngokuvumelana neSihlomelo 2.
ABaphathiswa bamaphondo mabaziphathe ngokwemigqaliselo yokuziphatha etshiwo yimithetho yepalamente yezwelonke.
ABaphathiswa bephondo abavumelekanga ukuba–

item.p: benze nawuphi na omnye umsebenzi ohlawulelwayo;
benze ngendlela engavisisaniyo nesikhundla abakuso, okanye bazibeke kwimeko esenokwenza kubekho ungquzulwano phakathi kweembopheleleko zabo zaseburhulumenteni nemicimbi yabo yangasese; okanye
basebenzise isikhundla sabo okanye ingcombolo abayiphathisiweyo, beyisebenzisela ukuzityebisa okanye ukuzuzisa omnye umntu ngendlela engafanelekanga.

content.p: INkulumbuso inokuthi ngokwenza isihlokomiso ifudusele komnye uMphathiswa wephondo–

item.p: ukusingathwa komthetho wepalamente okuphathiswe omnye uMphathiswa wephondo; okanye
naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi ophathiswe omnye uMphathiswa wephondo ngokomthetho wepalamente.

content.p: INkulumbuso yephondo inokuphathisa uMphathiswa wephondo naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi womnye uMphathiswa wephondo ongekhoyo emsebenzini okanye ongakwaziyo ukusebenzisa elo gunya okanye ukwenza loo msebenzi.

Xa umasipala engakwazi ukuyifeza okanye engayifezi imbopheleleko yoburhulumente engokoMgaqo-siseko okanye engokomthetho wepalamente, urhulumente wephondo waloo masipala usenokungenelela ngokuthabatha nawaphi na amanyathelo afanelekileyo ukuqinisekisa ukuba iyafezekiswa loo mbopheleleko, kuquka–

item.p: nokukhupha umyalelo oya kwiBhunga likaMasipala, ochaza ubungakanani bokusilela ukufezekisa iimbopheleleko zakhe, kwaye uchaze namanyatheloafunekayo ukuze kufezekiswe iimbopheleleko zakhe;
nokuyithathela kuye imbopheleleko kuloo masipala ngokwendlela efunekayo ukuze–
kuhlale kukho imilinganiselo eyimfuneko yezwelonke okanye kubekho imilinganiselo eyeyona iphantsi yokuba kwenziwe oko kufuneka kwenziwe;
kuhlale kukho ubunye kuqoqosho;
kuhlale kukho ukhuseleko lwezwelonke; okanye
nokulichitha elo Bhunga likaMasipala kuze kumiselwe umlawuli de libe iBhunga likaMasipala elinyulwe ngokutsha livakaliswe njengelimiselweyo, ukuba iimeko ezingaqhelekanga zifunisa elo nyathelo.

content.p: Ukuba urhulumente wephondo uyangenelela kumasipala ngokwesiqendwana (1) (b)-

item.p: makadlulisele isaziso esibhaliweyo sokungenelela-
kwilungu leKhabhinethi eliphathiswe imicimbi yoorhulumente basekuhlaleni;
nakwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo akulo nakwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, zingekapheli iintsuku ezili-14 luqalile ungenelelo;
ungenelelo maluphele ukuba-

ilungu leKhabhinethi elichaphazelekayo eliphathiswe imicimbi yoorhulumente basekuhlaleni lithi lingavumelani nongenelelo kwisithuba seentsuku ezingama-28 luqalile ungenelelo, okanye ukuba liyaphela elo xesha lingekatsho ukuba liyavumelana nongenelelo; okanye
Bhunga lithi lingavumelani nongenelelo kwisithuba seentsuku ezili-180 luqalile ungenelelo, okanye ukuba liyaphela elo xesha lingekatsho ukuba liyavumelana nongenelelo; kananjalo
iBhunga malithi, ngoxa luqhubeka ungenelelo, liman’ukuluqwalasela ngokutsha rhoqo ungenelelo kwaye linokwenza naluphi na uncomelo olufanelekileyo kurhulumente wephondo.

content.p: Ukuba iBhunga likaMasipala lichithiwe ngokwesiqendwana (1)(c)-

item.p: urhulumente wephondo makathi ngoko nangoko adlulisele isaziso esibhaliweyo sokuchithwa kwalo-
kwilungu leKhabhinethi eliphathiswe imicimbi yoorhulumente basekuhlaleni;
nakwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo efanelekileyo nakwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke; kwaye

ukuchithwa kuqala ukusebenza emva kweentsuku ezili-14 ukususela kumhla wokufunyanwa kwesaziso liBhunga ngaphandle kokuba kukhatyiwe lilungu leKhabhinethi okanye liBhunga ngaphambi kokuphela kwezo ntsuku zili-14.

content.p: Ukuba umasipala akakwazi ukuyifeza okanye akayifezi imbopheleleko engokoMgaqo-siseko okanye engokomthetho wepalamente yokuvuma isabelo- mali okanye naziphi na iinzame zokungenisa imali eziyimfuneko ukuze kubekho isabelo-mali, loo rhulumente wephondo makangenelele ngokuthabatha nawaphi na amanyathelo afanelekileyo okuqinisekisa ukuba isabelo-mali okanye ezo nzame zokungenis’imali ziyavunywa, kuquka nokulichitha iBhunga likaMasipala-

item.p: nokumisela umlawuli de iBhunga likaMasipala elinyulwe ngokutsha libe libhengezwe njengelinyuliweyo;
nokuvuma isabelo-mali sexeshana okanye iinzame zokungenis’imali zexeshana ukuze aqhubeke esebenza umasipala.

content.p: Ukuba umasipala, ngenxa yengxubakaxaka kwiimeko zakhe zemali, usilela ngokugqithisileyo okanye ngokuzingisileyo ekufezekiseni iimbopheleleko zakhe zokwenza iinkonzo ezisisiseko okanye zokufeza iimbopheleleko zakhe ezingokwemali, okanye ukuba uyavuma ukuba akakwazi ukuzifeza iimbopheleleko zakhe okanye ezemali, urhulumente wephondo ofanelekileyo-

item.p: makenze icebo lohlangulo elinjongo yalo ikukwenza umasipala akwazi ukuzifeza iimbopheleleko anazo zokunika iinkonzo ezisisiseko okanye ezinye iimbopheleleko ezingokwemali, nto leyo-
emayilungiselelwe ngokuvumelana nomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke;

emnkqamangelayo umasipala ekusebenziseni kwakhe igunya lakhe lokuwis’imithetho nelokuba ngurhulumente, kodwa elisebenzisa kuphela ngokwemfuneko ekhoyo ukusombulula ingxukabaxaka kwimicimbi yakhe yemali; aze

alichithe iBhunga likaMasipala, ukuba umasipala akanakuzivuma okanye akazivumi iinzame zokuwis’umthetho, kuquka nesabelo-mali okanye ezinye iinzame zokungenis’imali, eziyimfuneko ukuphumelelisa icebo lohlangulo, aze-
amisele umlawuli de iBhunga likaMasipala elinyulwe ngokutsha libe libhengezwe njengelinyuliweyo; aze
avume isabelo-mali sexeshana okanye iinzame zexeshana zokungenis’ imali okanye nokuba zeziphi na ezinye iinzame eziphumelelisa icebo lohlangulo lokwenza ukuba aqhubeke esebenza umasipala; okanye
ukuba iBhunga likaMasipala alichithwanga ngokwesiqendu (b), alenze lisebenze icebo lohlangulo xa umasipala engakwazi ukulisebenzisa okanye engalisebenzisi icebo lohlangulo.

content.p: Ukuba urhulumente wephondo uyangenelela kumasipala ngokwesiqendwana (4) okanye (5), makadlulisele isaziso esibhaliweyo sokungenelela–

item.p: kwilungu leKhabhinethi eliphathiswe imicimbi yoorhulumente basekuhlaleni;
nakwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo efanelekileyo, nakwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke, zingaphelanga iintsuku ezisixhenxe luqalile ungenelelo.

content.p: Ukuba urhulumente wephondo akanako ukuwasebenzisa ngokwaneleyo okanye akawasebenzisi ngokwaneleyo amagunya okanye akanako ukuyenza ngokwaneleyo okanye akayenzi ngokwaneleyo imisebenzi ekuthethwe ngayo kwisiqendwana (4) okanye (5), urhulumente wezwelonke makangenelele ngokwesiqendwana (4) okanye (5) endaweni karhulumente wephondo ochaphazelekayo.
Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke unokukulawula ukusetyenziswa kwesi siqendu, kuquka neenkqubo ezimiselwe sesi siqendu.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 139 sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 4 soMthetho Weshumi Elinanye Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2003.]

content.p: Isigqibo esenziwe yiNkulumbuso masibhalwe phantsi ukuba–

item.p: senziwe ngokomthetho wepalamente; okanye
sineziphumo ezibandakany’umthetho.

content.p: Isigqibo esibhaliweyo esenziwe yiNkulumbuso masityikitywe nangomnye uMphathiswa wephondo ukuba eso sigqibo sichaphazela umsebenzi owabelwe loo Mphathiswa wephondo.
Izihlokomiso, imimiselo nokunye okuyimithethwana yephondo, malukwazi ukukufumana uluntu.
Umthetho wepalamente wephondo usenokuxela indlela, nokuthi kangakanani, emayithi imithethwana ekhankanywe kwisiqendwana (3) –

item.p: ithiwe thaca kwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo; ize
ivunywe yindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo.

content.p: Ukuba indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, ngevoti exhaswa sisininzi samalungu ayo, iphumeza isindululo sokungabi sabathemba aBaphathiswa bephondo, kodwa ingayiquki iNkulumbuso, iNkulumbuso mayibatshintshe aBaphathiswa.
Ukuba indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, ngevoti exhaswa sisininzi samalungu ayo, iphumeza isindululo sokungabi sayithemba iNkulumbuso, iNkulumbuso nabanye aBaphathiswa bephondo mabaphume ezikhundleni.

Indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo inokuphumeza umgaqo-siseko wephondo okanye, kwimeko ekuyimfuneko kuyo, yenze utshintsho kuwo, ukuba ubuncinane isibini kwisithathu samalungu ayo siyawuvotela loo Mthetho uYilwayo.
Umgaqo-siseko wephondo, okanye ukwenziwa kotshintsho kumgaqo-siseko wephondo, makungangqubani noMgaqo-siseko, kodwa usenokuthetha–

item.p: ngezakhiwo zendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo okanye ngezakhiwo zorhulumente wephondo nangeenkqubo ezahlukileyo kwezo ekuthethwe ngazokwesi Sahluko; okanye
ngendima negunya nobume bekumkani yomthonyama, apho kufanelekileyo.

content.p: Okutshiwo kumgaqo-siseko wephondo okanye kutshintsho olwenziwa kumgaqo- siseko wephondo ngokwesiqendu (a) okanye (b) sesiqendwana (1)–

item.p: makuvumelane nokutshiwo kwisiqendu 1 nakwiSahluko 3; kwaye
akuvumelekanga ukuba kuthi jize kwiphondo naliphi na igunya okanye umsebenzi owela–
ngaphaya kwezinto ezinokwenziwa liphondo ngokweSihlomelo 4 nesesi-5; okanye
ngaphaya kwamagunya nemisebenzi ethiwa jize kwiphondo zezinye iziqendu zoMgaqo-siseko.

content.p: Ukuba indlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo iphumeze umgaqo-siseko okanye yenza utshintsho kuwo, uSihlalo wendlu yowiso-mthetho makathumele umbhalo waloo mgaqo-siseko okanye wotshintsho lomgaqo-siseko kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ukuze uvunywe yiyo.
Akukho mbhalo womgaqo-siseko wephondo okanye wotshintsho lomgaqo-siseko othi ube ngumthetho de ibe iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ivumile ukuba–

item.p: umbhalo lowo uphunyezwe ngokuvumelana nesiqendu 142; nokuthi
uwonke umbhalo uyavumelana nesiqendu 143.

content.p: INkulumbuso yephondo mayiwuvume ize iwutyikitye umbhalo womgaqo-siseko wephondo okanye wotshintsho lomgaqo-siseko othe wavunywa yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko.

Umbhalo ovunyiweyo waza watyikitywa yiNkulumbuso mawupapashwe kuShicilelo-Mithetho LukaRhulumente lwezwelonke kwaye uqalisa usakupapashwa okanye ngomnye umhla ogqitywe ngokwaloo mgaqo-siseko okanye ngokolo tshintsho.
Umbhalo otyikityiweyo womgaqo-siseko wephondo okanye wotshintsho kumgaqo-siseko ububungqina obupheleleyo boko ukutshoyo kwaye, wakuba upapashiwe, mawuphathiswe iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ukuba iwugcine.

section.heading: Ungquzulwano phakathi kwemithetho yepalamente yezwelonke neyamaphondo

content.p: Esi siqendu sisebenza kungquzulwano oluphakathi kwemithetho yepalamente yezwelonke nemithetho yepalamente yamaphondo ewela kummandla wentsebenzo edweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4.
Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke osebenza ngokufanayo kulo lonke ilizwe kuba nguwo owongamayo phezu komthetho wephondo ukuba kuhlangatyezwana nawo omnye wale miqathango ilandelayo:

item.p: umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ungomcimbi ongenakulawulwa ngempumelelo ngumthetho wepalamente owiswe liphondo ngalinye;

umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ungomcimbi ofunisa, ukuze usingathwe ngempumelelo, ukuba kubekho ukufana kulo lonke ilizwe, ube ke loo mthetho wepalamente wezwelonke usenza ukuba kubekho oko kufana ngokumisela–
imilinganiselo;
izakhiwo-mida; okanye
iinkqubo zezwelonke.
umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke uyimfuneko ukuze–
kuhlale kukho ukhuseleko lwezwelonke;
kuhlale kukho ubunye kuqoqosho;
kukhuselwe imarike ekudlelwana ngayo ngumntu wonke ngokumayela nokuthuthwa kwempahla, iinkonzo, ubuncwane nemisebenzi;
kukhuthazwe imisebenzi yoqoqosho kuwo onke amaphondo;
kukhuthazwe ukulingana kwamathuba okanye ukuzifumana ngokulinganayo iinkonzo zikarhulumente; okanye
ukukhuselwa kokusingqongileyo.

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke kuba nguwo owongamayo phezu komthetho wepalamente wephondo ukuba umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke injongo yawo kukuthintela isenzo esingabhadlanga esenziwa liphondo–

item.p: esinobungozi kuqoqosho, kwimpilo, okanye kukhuseleko lwelinye iphondo okanye kukhuseleko lwelizwe liphela; okanye
esithintela ukwenziwa kwenkqubo yoqoqosho yezwelonke isebenze.

content.p: Xa kukho imbambano mayela nokuba uyimfuneko kusini na umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ofunekela injongo echazwe kwisiqendwana (2)(c), ize loo mbambano ize phambi kwenkundla ukuze isonjululwe, inkundla mayicingele ukuvunywa okanye ukukhatywa kwaloo mthetho wepalamente liBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke.
Umthetho wepalamente wephondo kuba nguwo owongamayo phezu komthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ukuba isiqendwana (2) okanye (3) asisebenzi.
Umthetho owenziwe ngokoMthetho wePalamente okanye ngokoMthetho wephondo unokongama kuphela ukuba loo mthetho uvunyiwe liBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke.

Ukuba iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke alifikeleli kwisigqibo kwisithuba seentsuku ezingama-30 zokuhlala kwalo kokuqala emva kokuba umthetho udluliselwe kulo, loo mthetho mawuthathwe njengovunyiweyo liBhunga.

Ukuba iBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke aliwuvumi umthetho ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (6), malithumele izizathu zokungawuvumi kwigunya elithumele loo mthetho kwiBhunga, likwenza oko zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-30 lisenzile isigqibo sokungawuvumi.
Ukuba kukho ungquzulwano phakathi komthetho wepalamente wezwelonke nokutshiwo ngumgaqo-siseko wephondo ngokumayela–

item.p: nomcimbi lo Mgaqo-siseko ofuna ngokucacileyo ukuba kubekho umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ngawo, kuba ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke owongamayo phezu koko kutshiwo ngumgaqo-siseko wephondo;
nokungenelela komthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ngokwesiqendu 44(2), kuba ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke owongamayo phezu kokutshiwo ngumgaqo-siseko wephondo; okanye

nomcimbi owela kummandla wentsebenzo odweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4, kusebenza isiqendu 146 ngokungathi okuchaphazelekileyo okutshiwo ngumgaqo-siseko wephondo kungumthetho wepalamente wephondo okuthethwe ngako kweso siqendu.

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendu 44(2) kuba nguwo owongamayo phezu komthetho wepalamente wephondo mayela nemicimbi ewela kwimimandla yentsebenzo edweliswe kwiSihlomelo 5.
Ukuba imbambano engongquzulwano ayinakusonjululwa yinkundla, kuba ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke owongamayo phezu komthetho wepalamente wephondo okanye phezu komgaqo-siseko wephondo.

Isigqibo senkundla esithi kongama umthetho wepalamente othile phezu komnye umthetho wepalamente asiwenzi ube ngophuthileyo loo mthetho wepalamente ongomnye, kodwa uba ngongasebenziyo okwelo xesha kusekho ungquzulwano.

Xa iqwalasela okubonakala ngathi lungquzulwano phakathi komthetho wepalamente wezwelonke nowephondo, okanye phakathi komthetho wepalamente wezwelonke nomgaqo-siseko wephondo, zonke iinkundla mazikhethe indlela ebhadlileyo yokuchaz’ intsingiselo yawo eluphephayo ungquzulwano, kunokukhetha indlela yokuchaz’ intsingiselo yawo edal’ungquzulwano.
Urhulumente wasekuhlaleni ngoomasipala, abamele babekho kuwo wonke umhlaba weRiphablikhi.
Igunya loburhulumente nelokuwis’umthetho likamasipala likwiBhunga likaMasipala.
Umasipala unelungelo lokulawula, ngokwakhe, imicimbi yorhulumente wasekuhlaleni yoluntu lwakhe, ngokulawulwa yimithetho yepalamente yezwelonke nayeyephondo, njengoko kusitshiwo kuMgaqo-siseko.

Urhulumente wezwelonke okanye wephondo akavumelekanga ukuba abe ngumqobo ekukwazini kukamasipala ukusebenzisa amagunya akhe okanye ukwenza imisebenzi yakhe, okanye abe ngumqobo kwilungelo lakhe lokusebenzisa amagunya akhe okanye lokwenza imisebenzi yakhe.
Iinjongo zikarhulumente wasekuhlaleni-

item.p: kukuba kubekho urhulumente wentando yesininzi nomakaphendule woluntu lwasekuhlaleni;
kukuqinisekisa ukuba uluntu lufumana iinkonzo ngokuzingisileyo;
kukuqhubela phambili uphuhliso entlalweni nakuqoqosho;
kukuqhubela phambili imeko yokusingqongileyo engenabungozi nenempilo;
nokukhuthaza ukubandakanyeka koluntu nemibutho yoluntu kwimicimbi karhulumente wasekuhlaleni.

content.p: Umasipala makazame, ngokwamandla anawo ngokwasemalini nangokwasemsebenzini, ukuba azifeze iinjongo ezichazwe kwisiqendwana (1)
Umasipala –

item.p: makazilawule iinkqubo zakhe zolawulo nezolwabiwo-mali nezokucwangcisa ngendlela ebeka phambili iimfuno ezisisiseko zoluntu, nekhuthaza uphuhliso loluntu entlalweni nakuqoqosho; kananjalo
makathabath’inxaxheba kwiinkqubo zophuhliso zezwelonke nezephondo.

content.p: Urhulumente wesizwe noorhulumente bamaphondo kufuneka bathi, Urhulumente wezwelonke noorhulumente bamaphondo, ngokuwis’imithetho nangokusebenzisa eziny’iindlela, mabakuxhase, bakomeleze ukukwazi koomasipala ukuphath’ imicimbi yabo, ukusebenzisa amagunya abo nokwenza imisebenzi yabo.

Imithetho yepalamente eseluvavanyo yezwelonke okanye yamaphondo echaphazela ubume, amagunya okanye imisebenzi karhulumente wasekuhlaleni mayipapashwe ukuze abantu bavakalise uluvo ngayo ngaphambi kokuba ingeniswe ePalamente okanye kwindlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo, ngendlela enika urhulumente wasekuhlaleni ocwangcisiweyo, oomasipala nabanye abantu abachaphazelekayo ithuba lokutsho abafuna ukukutsho ngaloo mthetho wepalamente oseluvavanyo.
Kukho ezi ndidi zilandelayo zoomasipala:

item.p: uDidi A: umasipala onegunya elipheleleyo lokuba ngurhulumente nelokuwis’ imithetho;
uDidi B: umasipala odlelana ngegunya lokuba ngurhulumente nelokuwis’ umthetho kummandla wakhe edlelana nomasipala woDidi C okummandla wakhe;
uDidi C: umasipala onegunya lokuba ngurhulumente nelokuwis’imithetho kummandla oquka oomasipala abaliqela.

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke mawuzicacise iintlobo zoomasipala ezinokusekwa ngaphakathi kudidi ngalunye.
Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke–

item.p: mawuxele izinto emakuqondwe ngazo xa umasipala emele abe nodidi olunye olungu-A okanye xa emele abe noomasipala boDidi B no-C;
mawuxele izinto emakuqondwe ngazo neenkqubo zokwenza isigqibo ngemida yoomasipala, sisenziwa ligunya elizimeleyo; kananjalo

ngokulawulwa sisiqendu 229, makalungiselele ukuba ahlulwe ngokufanelekileyo amagunya nemisebenzi phakathi koomasipala xa ummandla unoomasipala boDidi B no-C. Ukwahlulwa kwamagunya nemisebenzi phakathi komasipala woDidi B nomasipala woDidi C kusenokungafani nokwahlulwa kwamagunya nemisebenzi phakathi komnye umasipala woDidi B naloo masipala woDidi C.

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (3) mawucingele imfuneko yokwenza iinkonzo zikamasipala ngendlela engakhalazisiyo nezingisileyo.
Umthetho wepalamente wephondo mawenze isigqibo ngeentlobo ezingafaniyo zikamasipala oza kusekwa kwiphondo.
Urhulumente ngamnye wephondo makaseke oomasipala kwiphondo lakhe ngendlela evisisana nomthetho wepalamente owiswe ngokwesiqendwana (2) nese-(3) kwaye, ngokuwis’umthetho okanye ngeziny’iindlela,–

item.p: makenze ukuba urhulumente wasekuhlaleni abekw’esweni kwaye axhaswe; kananjalo
makakhuthaze ukuphuhliswa kokukwazi kukarhulumente wasekuhlaleni ukusebenza ukuze oomasipala bayenze imisebenzi yabo, baziphathele nemicimbi yabo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (6A) safakelwa sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Wesithathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo- siseko ka-1998 saza sacinywa sisiqendu 2 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesibini Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2005.]

content.p: Urhulumente wezwelonke, ngokulawulwa sisiqendu 44, noorhulumente bamaphondo banegunya lokuwis’umthetho nelokuba ngurhulumente ukuqinisekisa ukuba yenziwa ngempumelelo ngoomasipala imisebenzi yabo kwimicimbi edweliswe kwiSihlomelo 4 nese-5, ngokukulawula ukusetyenziswa kwegunya lokuba ngurhulumente ngoomasipala ekuthethwe ngalo kwisiqendu 156(1).
Umasipala unegunya lokuba ngurhulumente mayela nemicimbi elandelayo, kwaye unelungelo lokuyilawula–

item.p: imicimbi karhulumente wasekuhlaleni edweliswe kwiCandelo B leSihlomelo 4 neCandelo B leSihlomelo 5; kunye
nawo nawuphi na omnye umcimbi abelwe wona ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke okanye wephondo.

content.p: Umasipala unokwenz’imithetho eyekamasipala aze ayilawule ukuze ilawuleke ngempumelelo imicimbi anelungelo lokuyilawula.

Ngokulawulwa sisiqendu 151(4), umthetho kamasipala ongqubanayo nomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke okanye wephondo, uphuthile. Ukuba kukho ungqubano phakathi komthetho kamasipala nomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke okanye wephondo ongasebenziyo ngenxa yongquzulwano ekuthethwe ngalo kwisiqendu 149, umthetho kamasipala mawuthathwe njengophilayo ngalo lonke ixesha loo mthetho wepalamente ungasebenzi.

Urhulumente wezwelonke noorhulumente bamaphondo mababele oomasipala, ngokuvumelana nangokulawulwa yimiqathango, ukusingathwa komcimbi odweliswe kwiCandelo A leSihlomelo 4 okanye kwiCandelo A leSihlomelo 5 onento yokwenza ncakasana norhulumente wasekuhlaleni, ukuba–

item.p: loo mcimbi ubungaphathwa kakuhle kakhulu ekuhlaleni; abe
nomasipala enako ukuwuphatha.

content.p: Umasipala unelungelo lokusebenzisa naliphi na igunya ngomcimbi oyimfuneko ukuze yenziwe ngempumelelo imisebenzi yakhe.

section.heading: Indlela akheke ngayo amaBhunga ooMasipala nokunyulwa kwawo

content.p: IBhunga likaMasipala–

item.p: ngamalungu anyulwe ngokwesiqendwana (2) nese-(3); okanye
ukuba kutsho umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke–
ngamalungu amiselwe ngamanye amaBhunga ooMasipala ukuba amele amanye amaBhunga; okanye
gawo kokubini amalungu anyulwe ngokwesiqendu (a) namalungu amiselwe ngokwesiqendwana (i) sesi siqendu.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1(a) soMthetho Wesibhozo Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2002 nasisiqendu 3 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesihlanu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Ukunyulwa kwamalungu ukuba abe kwiBhunga likaMasipala njengoko kulindelekile ngokwesiqendwana (1)(a) makube ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke, omawuxele inkqubo–

item.p: yokumelwa ngokulinganayo esekelwe kwelo candelo likamasipala lomqulu wabavoti wezwelonke, nothi makunyulwe amalungu kuludwe lwabagqatswa bamaqela oluqulunqwe ngokolandelelwano lokuthandwa kwabantu embuthweni; okanye
yokumelwa ngokulinganayo njengoko kuchazwe kwisiqendu (a) idityaniswe nenkqubo yokumelwa kweewadi esekelwe kwicandelo laloo masipala lomqulu wabavoti wezwelonke.

content.p: Inkqubo yonyulo engokwesiqendwana (2) mayibe nesiphumo, ngokubanzi, esikukumelwa ngokulinganayo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1(b) soMthetho Wesibhozo Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2002.]

item.p: Ukuba inkqubo yonyulo iquka ukumelwa kweewadi, ukususwa kwemida yeewadi makwenziwe ligunya elizimeleyo elimiselwe ngokweenkqubo, nelisebenza ngokweenkqubo neemfuneko ezitshiwo ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

p.remark: [Isiqendu (b) sacinywa sisiqendu 3 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesibini Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo- siseko ka-2005.]
[Isiqendwana (4) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 2 soMthetho Wesithathu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-1998.]

content.p: Umntu unokuvota kumasipala kuphela ukuba ubhalisiwe kwicandelo laloo masipala lomqulu wabavoti wezwelonke.

Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ekuthethwe ngawo kwisiqendwana (1)(b) mawuseke inkqubo evumela ukuba amaqela nezinto ezibonakaliswa ngaphakathi kwiBhunga likaMasipala owenza umiselo, ibe yemelwe ngokungakhalazisiyo kwiBhunga likaMasipala umntu amiselwa kulo.
Wonke ummi ofanelekayo ukuba avotele iBhunga likaMasipala uyafaneleka ukuba abe lilungu lelo Bhunga, ngaphandle –

item.p: komntu oqeshwe ngumasipala, okanye okwinkonzo kamasipala, kananjalo abe efumana umvuzo ngoko kuqeshwa okanye ngaloo nkonzo, kananjalo kungekho nto imkhululayo koko kungafaneleki ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke;

komntu oqeshwe ngurhulumente, okanye okwinkonzo karhulumente, kwelinye inqwanqwa likarhulumente, abe efumana umvuzo ngoko kuqeshwa kwakhe okanye ngaloo nkonzo yakhe, kananjalo engafaneleki ukuba abe lilungu leBhunga likaMasipala ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke;
komntu ongafanelekiyo ukuba avotele indlu yowiso-mthetho okanye ongafanelekiyo ngokwesiqendu 47(1)(c), (d) okanye (e) ukuba abe lilungu leNdlu;

kwelungu leNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, umthunywa kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke okanye ilungu lendlu yowiso-mthetho yephondo; kodwa oku kungafaneleki akusebenzi kwilungu leBhunga likaMasipala elimelaurhulumente wasekuhlaleni kwiBhunga lezwelonke; okanye
kwelungu lelinye iBhunga likaMasipala; kodwa oku kungafaneleki akusebenzi kwilungu leBhunga likaMasipala elimela elo Bhunga kwelinye iBhunga likaMasipala wodidi olwahlukileyo.

content.p: Umntu ongafanelekiyo ukuba abe lilungu leBhunga likaMasipala ngokwesiqendwana (1)(a), (b), (d) okanye (e) unokuba ngumgqatswa wokungena kwiBhunga, kodwa ngokulawulwa yimida okanye yimiqathango ebekwe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Izithuba ezikwiBhunga likaMasipala mazivalwe ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) songezwa sisiqendu 4 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesihlanu Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2008.]

content.p: Ixesha lokuba sesikhundleni leBhunga likaMasipala alinakuba ngaphezu kweminyaka emihlanu, ngokwendlela ekugqitywe ngayo ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

Ukuba iBhunga likaMasipala liyachithwa ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke, okanye xa ixesha lalo liphela, makubekho unyulo zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingama-90 ukususela kumhla elachithwa ngawo elo Bhunga okanye ukususela kumhla elaphela ngawo ixesha lalo.

IBhunga likaMasipala, elingelilo iBhunga eliye lachithwa ngenxa yongenelelo olungokwesiqendu 139, liqhubeka linegunya lokusebenza ukususela kwixesha lokuchithwa kwalo okanye ukususela kwixesha lokuphela kwexesha lalo, de libe iBhunga elinyulwe ngokutsha libhengezwe njengelinyuliweyo.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 159 sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Wesibini Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-1998.]

content.p: IBhunga likaMasipala–

item.p: lenza izigqibo ngokusetyenziswa kwawo onke amagunya nangokwenziwa kwayo yonke imisebenzi kamasipala;
malinyule usihlalo walo;
lisenokunyula ikomiti yokuba ngurhulumente nezinye iikomiti, ngokulawulwa ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke;
lisenokuqesha abasebenzi abayimfuneko ukuze yenziwe ngempumelelo imisebenzi yabo.

content.p: Imisebenzi elandelayo ayinakuphathiswa omnye umntu liBhunga likaMasipala:

item.p: ukuphunyezwa kwemithetho masipala;
ukuvunywa kolwabiwo-mali;
ukufunwa kwemirhumo nezinye iirhafu, neentlawulo; kwakunye
nokufunwa kweemali-mboleko.
Makubekho isininzi samalungu eBhunga likaMasipala ngaphambi kokuba kuvotelwe nawuphi na umcimbi.
Yonke imibandela engemicimbi ekhankanywe kwisiqendwana (2) igqitywa ngesigqibo esithathwe liBhunga likaMasipala ngevoti exhasayo yesininzi samalungu alo.
Yonke eminye imibandela ephambi kweBhunga likaMasipala igqitywa sisininzi seevoti ezifakiweyo.

content.p: Akukho mthetho kamasipala omawuphunyezwe liBhunga likaMasipala azisiwe ngaphandle kokuba–

item.p: onke amalungu eBhunga azisiwe kuselixesha; kwaye
nomthetho kamasipala ocetywayo upapashiwe ukuze uluntu luvakaliseizimvo.

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke usenokuxela izinto emakuqwalaselwe zona ekwenzeni isigqibo–

item.p: ngobukhulu beBhunga likaMasipala;
mayela nokuba amaBhunga ooMasipala anokuyinyula kusini na ikomiti yokuba ngurhulumente okanye nayiphi na enye ikomiti; okanye
ngobungakanani bekomiti yokuba ngurhulumente okanye nayiphi na enye ikomiti yeBhunga likaMasipala.

content.p: IBhunga likaMasipala linokwenza imithetho etsho imigaqo nemiyalelo–

item.p: yamalungiselelo alo angaphakathi;
yemisebenzi yalo nendlela emakuqhutywe ngayo;
yokusekwa kweekomiti zalo, indlela emazakheke ngayo, iinkqubo zokulandelwa, amagunya azo nemisebenzi yazo.

content.p: IBhunga likaMasipala maliyenzele elubala imisebenzi yalo, kananjalo linokuzivalela libe lodwa xa lihleli, okanye xa kuhleli iikomiti zalo, kuphela xa kufanelekile ukwenza njalo xa kucingelwa ubunjani bemisebenzi egwadlwayo.
Amalungu eBhunga likaMasipala anelungelo lokuthabath’inxaxheba ekuhlalelweni kwemicimbi yalo naleyo yeekomiti zalo, ngendlela–

item.p: evumela ukuba amaqela amelweyo ngaphakathi kwiBhunga amelwe kakuhle nemicimbi emelweyo ngaphakathi kwiBhunga imelwe kakuhle;
evisisana nentando yesininzi; nangendlela
enokuthi ilawulwe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wephondo, ngaphakathi kwemida yomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke, usenokuxela ukungabi nakubekwa tyala kwamaBhunga ooMasipala namalungu awo.
Umthetho kamasipala unokunyanzeliswa emva kokuba upapashwe kushicilelo- mithetho oluvunyiweyo lwephondo akulo umasipala lowo.
Ushicilelo-mithetho oluvunyiweyo lwephondo malupapashe umthetho kamasipala lusakucelwa ngumasipala.
Uluntu malukwazi ukufikelela kwimithetho kamasipala.
UMthetho wePalamente owiswe ngokwenkqubo yesiqendu 76–

item.p: mawubonise ukuyamkela imibutho yezwelonke neyephondo emela oomasipala; kwaye
mawuxele iinkqubo anokuthi ngazo urhulumente wasekuhlaleni–
abonisane norhulumente wezwelonke okanye wephondo;
achonge abameli bokuthabath’inxaxheba kwiBhunga lamaPhondo leZwelonke; kananjalo
athabath’inxaxheba kwinkqubo exelwe kumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke ekuthethwa ngawo kwisiqendu 221(1)(c).

p.remark: [Isiqendu 163(b) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 4 soMthetho Wesixhenxe Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Nawuphi na umcimbi ongorhulumente wasekuhlaleni ekungathethwanga ngawo kuMgaqo-siseko unokucaciswa ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke okanye ngumthetho wepalamente wephondo, kodwa ngaphakathi kwemida yomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Igunya lokuchophel’amatyala leRiphablikhi likwiinkundla.
Iinkundla zizimele geqe, zilawulwa kuphela nguMgaqo-siseko nangumthetho, emaziwusebenzise ngokungenamkhethe nangokungenaloyiko, ngaphandle kokukholis’umnt’othile okanye ukumona.
Akukho mntu okanye candelo likarhulumente uvumelekileyo ukuba aphazamise ukusebenza kweenkundla.

Amacandelo karhulumente, ngokuwis’imithetho nangeziny’iindlela, makazincedise kwaye azikhusele iinkundla ukuqinisekisa ukuba zizimele geqe, azinamkhethe, zinesidima, ziyafikeleleka kwaye zisebenza ngempumelelo.
Umyalelo okhutshwe yinkundla okanye isigqibo esikhutshwe yiyo sinkqamangela bonke abantu namacandelo karhulumente esisebenza kubo okanye kuwo.
IJaji Eyintloko iyintloko yeejaji kwaye yiyo ephethe ukumiselwa kwemigaqo nokubekwa kwayo esweni iyeyokwenziwa kwemisebenzi yokuchotshelwa kwamatyala kuzo zonke iinkundla.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (6) sifakelwe sisiqendu 1 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2012]

content.p: Iinkundla–

item.p: yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko;
yiNkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno;

yiNkundla Ephakamileyo yoMzantsi-Afrika, kunye nayo nayiphi na inkundla ephakamileyo yezibheno esenokusekwa nguMthetho wePalamente ukuze iphulaphule izibheno ezisuka kuyo nayiphi na inkundla ekwinqanaba elilingana neleNkundla Ephakamileyo yoMzantsi-Afrika;
ziiNkundla zeeMantyi; kunye

nayo nayiphi na enye inkundla esekwe okanye evunyiweyo ngokoMthetho wePalamente, kuquka nayiphi na inkundla ekwinqanaba elilingana neleNkundla Ephakamileyo yoMzantsi-Afrika okanye elilingana neleeNkundla zeeMantyi.

p.remark: [Isiqendu (c) no-(e) zifakelwe nguMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Wokwenz’Utshintsho KuMgaqo- siseko ka-2012]

content.p: INkundla yoMgaqo-siseko yiJaji eyiNtloko yoMzantsi-Afrika, iSekela leJaji eyiNtloko kunye nezinye iijaji ezilithoba.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 11 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshint- sho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Umcimbi ophambi kweNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko mawuphulaphulwe ziijaji ezisibhozo ubuncinane.
INkundla yoMgaqo-siseko–

item.p: yeyona nkundla iphakamileyo kwiRiphablikhi; kwaye
inokwenza isigqibo.
ngemicimbi yoMgaqo-siseko;

nangawo nawuphi na omnye umcimbi, ukuba ithe yavumela ukuba kubhenwe ngesizathu esikukuba loo mcimbi uvelisa ingongoma yomthetho ekunokuphikiswana ngayo ebaluleke kuluntu ngokubanzi emayiqwalaselwe yiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko; kwaye
yiyo eyenza isigqibo esingenakuphikiswa mayela nokuba umcimbi ungowokuchotshelwa yiyo kusini na.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sithatyathelwe indawo sisiqendu 3 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Sokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo ka-2012]

content.p: YiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko kuphela enokuthi–

item.p: yenze isigqibo ngeembambano eziphakathi kwamacandelo karhulumente kurhulumente wezwelonke okanye kowephondo mayela nobume obungokoMgaqo-siseko, amagunya okanye imisebenzi yaloo macandelo karhulumente;

yenze isigqibo mayela nokuba uyavisisana kusini na noMgaqo-siseko uMthetho oYilwayo wePalamente okanye wephondo, kodwa ivumeleke ukuba yenze njalo kuphela kwiimeko ezilindeleke kwisiqendu 79 okanye 121;
yenze isigqibo ngezicelo ekuthetwa ngazo kwisiqendu 80 okanye 122;
yenze isigqibo mayela nokuba luyavisisana kusini na noMgaqo-siseko utshintsho olwenziwayo kuMgaqo-siseko;
yenze isigqibo mayela nokuba iPalamente okanye uMongameli woyisakele kusini na ukuyifeza imbopheleleko engokoMgaqo-siseko; okanye
aqinisekise ukufaneleka komgaqo-siseko wephondo ngokwesiqendu 144.

content.p: YiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko eyenza isigqibo esingenakuphikiswa mayela nokuba uMthetho wePalamente, uMthetho wephondo okanye isenzo sikaMongameli siyavisisana kusini na noMgaqo-siseko, kwaye mayitsho ukuba iyavumelana kusini na nomyalelo ophuthisa loo nto iphuthiswayo okhutshwe yiNkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno, yiNkundla Ephakamilyo yoMzantsi-Afrika okanye yinkundla ekwinqanaba elilingana nelezi nkundla, ngaphambi kokuba loo myalelo ube ungasebenza.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (5) sithatyathelwe indawo sisiqendu 3 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2012]

content.p: Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke okanye imigaqo yeNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko mayimvumele umntu, xa kuya kuba bubulungisa ukwenza njalo, ngemvume yeNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko–

item.p: ukuba awuzise ngqo umcimbi kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko; okanye
abhenele ngqo kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko esuka nakuyiphi na inkundla.

content.p: Umcimbi ongoMgaqo-siseko uquka nawuphi na umbandela ongokuchazwa kwentsingiselo, ukukhuselwa, okanye ukunyanzeliswa koMgaqo-siseko.
INkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno nguMongameli, uSekela-Mongameli kunye neejaji zesibheno ezilinani eligqitywa ngokoMthetho wePalamente.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (1) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 12 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshint- sho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Umcimbi ophambi kweNkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno mawugqitywe ziijaji ezilinani eligqitywe ngokoMthetho wePalamente.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (2) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 12 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshint- sho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

item.p: INkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno inokwenz’isigqibo kuwo nawuphi na umcimbi osuka kwiNkundla Ephakamileyo yoMzantsi-Afrika okanye osuka kwinkundla ekwinqanaba elilinganayo neleNkundla Ephakamileyo YoMzantsi- Afrika, ngaphandle kwemicimbi yabasebenzi okanye yokhuphiswano ngokwendlela exelwe nguMthetho wePalamente.
INkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno ivumeleke ukuba yenze isiqgibo kuphela—
ngezibheno;
ngemibandela enento yokwenza nezibheno;
nangawo nawuphi na omnye umcimbi onokudluliselwa kuyo kwiimeko ezichazwe nguMthetho wePalamente.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sithatyathelwe indawo sisiqendu 4 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko]

content.p: INkundla Ephakamileyo YoMzantsi-Afrika inokwenz’isigqibo–

item.p: ngawo nawuphi na umcimbi ongoMgaqo-siseko ngaphandle komcimbi–
ethe iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko yavuma ukuba uze kuyo ngqo ngokwesiqendu 167(6)(a) ; okanye
owabelwe nguMthetho wePalamente ukuba uye kwenye inkundla ekwinqanaba elilinganayo neleNkundla Ephakamileyo YoMzantsi-Afrika; kunye;
nawo nawuphi na omnye umcimbi ongabelwanga ukuba uye kwenye inkundla nguMthetho wePalamente.

content.p: INkundla Ephakamileyo YoMzantsi-Afrika inamaCandelo amiselwe nguMthetho wePalamente, Mthetho lowo omawuyalele ukuba-

item.p: kwakhiwe amaCandelo, anekomkhulu elinye okanye amanye amabini kwiCandelo ngalinye;
kuxelwe ukuba iCandelo linaliphi igunya okanye ikomkhulu elineCandelo.

content.p: ICandelo ngalinye leNkundla Ephakamileyo yoMzantsi-Afrika-

item.p: linoMongameli weeJaji;
lisenokuba noSekela-Mongameli weeJaji okanye ooSekela-Mongameli weeJaji abaliqela; kwaye
linezinye iijaji ezinani lazo liqingqwa ngumthetho wezwelonke wendlu yowiso-mthetho.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 169 sithatyathelwe indawo sisiqendu 6 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2012]

content.p: Zonke iinkundla ngaphandle kwezo kuthethwe ngazo kwisiqendu 167, 168 nesama-169 zinokwenz’isigqibo ngawo nawuphi na umcimbi ogqitywe nguMthetho wePalamente, kodwa inkundla ekwinqanaba elingaphantsi kweleNkundla Ephakamileyo YoMzantsi- Afrika ayivumelekanga ukuba izame ukufumana ukuba uyavisisana kusini na noMgaqo- siseko umthetho wepalamente okanye isenzo sikaMongameli okanye yenze isigqibo ngako oko.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 170 sithatyathelwe indawo sisiqendu 6 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2012]

content.p: Zonke iinkundla zisebenza ngokomthetho wepalamente wezwelonke, kananjalo imigaqo yazo neenkqubo mazixelwe ngumthetho wepalamente wezwelonke.
Xa isenz’isigqibo ngomcimbi ongoMgaqo-siseko enegunya lawo, inkundla–

item.p: mayivakalise ukuba nawuphi na umthetho ongavisisaniyo noMgaqo-siseko uphuthile okanye nasiphi na isenzo esingavisisaniyo noMgaqo-siseko siphuthile, kodwa ukuphutha kukuloo ndawana engavisisaniyo noMgaqo- siseko kuphela; kananjalo
inokukhupha nawuphi na umyalelo onobulungisa nongakhalazisiyo, kuquka–
nomyalelo othintela ukuba kungaqaleli emva ukusebenza komyalelo ophuthisayo; kunye
nomyalelo okuxhomayo ixesha elithile ukubhengezwa kwento iyephuthileyo, kubekho nemiqathango, ngenjongo yokunik’ithuba igunya emalilungise lilungise isiphene eso.

INkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno, iNkundla Ephakamileyo YoMzantsi-Afrika okanye inkundla ekwinqanaba elilingana nelezi nkundla inokukhupha umyalelo mayela nokuba uyavisisana kusini na noMgaqo-siseko uMthetho wePalamente, uMthetho wephondo okanye isenzo sikaMongameli, kodwa umyalelo othi into ayivisisani noMgaqo-siseko awusebenzi de ibe iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ivumelene nawo.

p.remark: [Isiqendu (a) sithatyathelwe indawo sisiqendu 7 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesishenxe Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2012]

item.p: Inkundla ekhupha umyalelo othi into ayivisisani noMgaqo-siseko isenokukhupha umyalelo wexeshana othintela ukwenziwa kwento ethile okanye inike umntu olunye uncedo oluthile lwexeshana, okanye isenokuwuphosa komnye umhla umcimbi lowo, kude kufumaneke isigqibo seNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ngokubhadla kwaloo Mthetho okanye isenzo.
Umthetho wepalamente wezwelonke mawuthethe ngokudluliselwa komyalelo wokungavisisani kwento noMgaqo-siseko kwiNkundla yoMgaqo- siseko.

Nawuphi na umntu okanye icandelo likarhulumente ochaphazeleka ngokwaneleyo uvumelekile ukuba abhene, okanye enze isicelo, ngokuya ngqo kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ngenjongo yokwenza ukuba iNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko ivumelane nomyalelo wokungabhadli kwento ngokoMgaqo- siseko okanye ngenjongo yokuba iwutshintshe loo myalelo okhutshwe yenye inkundla ngokwesi siqendwana.

content.p: INkundla yoMgaqo-siseko, iNkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno neNkundla Ephakamileyo yoMzantsi-Afrika zinegunya elingenakohluthwa lokuyikhusela nokuyilawula ngokwazo inkqubo yazo, nelokuwuphuhlisa umthetho ongabhalwanga phantsi, zicingela ukwenziwa kobulungisa.

p.remark: [Isiqendu 173 sithatyathelwe indawo sisiqendu 8 soMthetho Weshumi Elinesixhenxe Wokwenz’ Utshintsho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2012]

content.p: Nawuphi na umntu olibhinqa okanye oyindoda onemfundo efanelekileyo ongumntu ofanelekileyo unokumiselwa abe ngumchopheli-matyala. Nawuphi na umntu oza kumiselwa ukuba abe kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko, kananjalo makabe ngummi waseMzantsi-Afrika.
Xa kumiselwa abachopheli-matyala makucingelwe imfuneko yokuba iintlanga zoMzantsi-Afrika nobuni babemi bawo zimelwe ngokobungakanani bazo.

UMongameli, njengentloko karhulumente wezwelonke, emva kokubonisana neKomishoni yeeJaji neenkokeli zamaqela amelweyo kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, umisela iJaji eyiNtloko neSekela leJaji eyiNtloko aze, emva kokubonisana neKomishoni yeeJaji, amisele uMongameli noSekela-Mongameli weNkundla Ephakamileyo yeZibheno.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (3) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 13 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshint- sho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Ezinye iijaji zeNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko zimiselwa nguMongameli, njengentloko karhulumente wezwelonke, emva kokubonisana neJaji eyiNtloko neenkokeli zamaqela amelwe kwiNdlu yoWiso-mthetho, ngokwenkqubo elandelayo:

item.p: iKomishoni mayiqulunqe uluhlu lwabatyunjwa olunamagama amathathu ngaphezulu kunenani labantu ekufuneka bemiselwe, ize ilunike uMongameliolu luhlu;
uMongameli unokumisela iijaji kolo luhlu, kwaye makazise iKomishoni yeeJaji, enika izizathu, ukuba kukho abathile kubatyunjwa abangamkelekiyo naxa kusekho izithuba ezisafuna ukuvalwa;
iKomishoni yeeJaji mayixabangele uluhlu ngabanye abatyunjwa aze uMongameli azivale izithuba eziseleyo ngokumisela ethabatha kuluhlu oluxatyangelweyo.

p.remark: [Isiqendwana (4) sathatyathelw’indawo sisiqendu 13 soMthetho Wesithandathu Wokwenz’Utshint- sho KuMgaqo-siseko ka-2001.]

content.p: Ngamaxesha onke, ubuncinane iijaji ezine zeNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko makube ngabantu ababeziijaji ngexesha ababemiselwa ngalo kwiNkundla yoMgaqo-siseko.
UMongameli makathi zonke iijaji zezinye iinkundla azimisele ngokucetyiswa yiKomishoni yeeJaji.
